english: But your hunger wasn't satisfied.

japanese: マール「扉、開かないみたい。[END]
english: Marle: It doesn't look like the door will open.

japanese: マール「な、何コレ？[END]
english: Marle: Wh, what's THIS?

japanese: ルッカ「壊れてるみたいね。 けど……、すごい……。 完全な人型ロボット……。[END]
english: Lucca: It looks like it's broken. But...... incredible...... A complete humanoid robot......

japanese: ルッカ「……。 直せるかも知れないわ。[END]
english: Lucca: ....... I might be able to fix it.

japanese: マール「え？　直すって……。 他のロボット達みたいに 襲って来ちゃうわよ！[END]
english: Marle: Huh? Fix it......? It'll attack us, like the other robots!

japanese: ルッカ「そうしないように直すの。 ロボット達は自分の意思で 襲って来るんじゃないのよ……。[END]
english: Lucca: I'll fix it so that it won't. Robots don't come and attack us of their own will......

japanese: 人間がそういう風に作ったの。 ロボット達の心をね。[END]
english: Humans made them like that. The robots' hearts.

japanese: マール「……ルッカには ロボット達の気持ちが わかるんだね……。[END]
english: Marle: ......Lucca, you understand the feelings of the robots......

japanese: ルッカ「じゃ、とりかかるわ。[END]
english: Lucca: Well, I'll get started.

japanese: ルッカ「これで、よし……っと！
english: Lucca: That should do it......!

japanese: 動かすわよ！[END]
english: I'll start it up!

japanese: ロボット「……。[END]
マール「おはよう！[END]
english: Marle: Good morning!

japanese: ロボット「お……  おはようゴザイマス、ご主人様。 ご命令を。[END]
english: Robot: G...... Good MORning, master. Your orders?

japanese: マール「私はご主人様じゃなくって マール！[END]
english: Marle: I'm not 'master', I'm Marle!

japanese: それにクロノに……[END]
english: And that's Crono......

japanese: あなたを直したルッカよ！[END]
english: And Lucca, who fixed you!

japanese: ロボット「了解シマシタ。 ワタシを直して下さったのは ルッカ様デスネ。[END]
english: Robot: UnderstOOD. The one who graciously repaired ME IS Lucca-sama.

japanese: ルッカ「ルッカでいいのよ。[END]
english: Lucca: Lucca is fine.

japanese: ロボット「そんな失礼な事は 出来マセン。[END]
english: Robot: I canNOT do such an impolite thing.

japanese: ルッカ「様づけで呼ぶ方が 失礼な事だってあるのよ。 ね、マール。[END]
english: Lucca: Addressing us with -sama attached would be more impolite. Wouldn't it, Marle.

japanese: マール「フフ……！[END]
english: Marle: *giggle*......!

japanese: ロボット「了解シマシタ、ルッカ。[END]
english: Robot: UnderSTOOD, Lucca.

japanese: ルッカ「よーし。 で、あなたの名前は？[END]
english: Lucca: All right. Well, what's your name?

japanese: ロボット「名前？　開発コードの事デスネ。 R66ーYデス。[END]
english: Robot: Name? The development code, YES? It IS R66-Y.

japanese: ルッカ「R66ーYか…… イカスじゃない！[END]
english: Lucca: R66-Y......? Isn't that cool!

japanese: マール「え～？ ダメよ、そんなカワイくないの！[END]
english: Marle: Whaat? No good, such an uncute one!

japanese: マール「ね、クロノ もっといい名前、つけてあげようよ！ 何がいいかしら？[END]
english: Marle: Hey, Crono, let's give him a better name! I wonder what would be good?

japanese: マール「ロボ…… ロボか！　悪くないね！[END]
english: Marle: Robo...... So it's Robo! Not bad!

japanese: マール「い～い？　あなたの名前は ロボよ！[END]
english: Marle: Okaaay? Your name is Robo!

japanese: ロボット「ロボ……デスネ。 メモリーインプット完了。[END]
english: Robot: Robo...... it IS. Memory input complete.

japanese: ルッカ「ねえ、ロボ。 ちょっと聞きたいんだけど…[END]
english: Lucca: Hey, Robo. We want to ask you a little something...

japanese: コレは…… どうしたのデショウ？[END]
english: THIS...... What COULD have happened?

japanese: ロボ「このプロメテドームには 多くの人間やワタシの仲間がいたはず デスガ……。[END]
english: Robo: There OUGHT to have been many humans and MY kind in this Promethe Dome......

japanese: ルッカ「言いにくいんだけど……。 ロボ、あなたが倒れている間に ここの人達はたぶん……[END]
english: Lucca: It's hard to say, but...... Robo, while you were broken down, the people of this place probably......

japanese: ソウデスカ……。[END]
english: I SEE......

japanese: ロボ「ではアナタ方は なぜココに？[END]
english: Robo: Then, why are YOU HERE?

japanese: ルッカ「私達は王国暦1000年から ゲートという時空のゆがみを通って ここに来ちゃったの。[END]
english: Lucca: We passed through a space-time distortion called a Gate from Kingdom Year 1000, and wound up here.

japanese: マール「ここにもゲートがあるって アリスドームで調べて来たの。[END]
english: Marle: We found out at Arris Dome there's a Gate here too, so we came here.

japanese: ルッカ「そしたら、あなたが 倒れてたってわけよ。[END]
english: Lucca: And when we did, here you were, broken down.

japanese: マール「けどドアが動かなくって こっから先に行けないの。[END]
english: Marle: But the door won't move, so we can't get past here.

japanese: ロボ「ココの電源は完全に死んで しまっているようデスネ。[END]
english: Robo: It sEEMS that the power HERE has completely died.

japanese: ロボ「北にある工場に行けば ここに連動する非常電源がありマス。 ワタシなら工場のセキュリティを 解じょ出来マス。[END]
english: Robo: If we go to the factory to the north, there IS emergency power that links to here. IF I go, I cAN call off the factory's security.

japanese: マール「ホントー？[END]
english: Marle: You mean it?

japanese: ロボ「修理して下さったのデス。 今度はワタシがお役に立ちマショウ。 シカシ、いつまで非常電源が持つか わかりマセン……。
english: Robo: You graciously fixed me. This time, I SHALL be of help. However, I dO NOT know how long the emergency power will hold......

japanese: ドナタかココに残って、電源が入ったら すぐにドアを開けないと……[END]
english: Unless someone remains HERE and opens the door immediately when the power flows in......

japanese: ルッカ「じゃあ、私かマールが 残るわ。[END]
english: Lucca: Well then, me or Marle will stay.

japanese: どっちが残ろうか？ マール ルッカ[END]
english: Which one will stay behind? Marle Lucca

japanese: マール「わかった！ 気をつけてね、クロノ！[END]
english: Marle: Got it! Be careful, Crono!

japanese: ルッカ「オーケー、わかったわ。 こっちは、まかせておいて。[END]
english: Lucca: Okay, got it. Leave this end of things to me.

japanese: マール「やったー！　ヒマしてたんだ。 ルッカとかわっていい？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Marle: All right! I had nothing to do. Can I switch with Lucca? Yes No

japanese: ルッカ「やっぱり、私の天さい的 ずのうが必要みたいね。 はい いいえ[END]
english: Lucca: Looks like you need my genius intellect after all. Yes No

japanese: マール「わかった、待ってる……。[END]
english: Marle: Okay, I'll wait......

japanese: ルッカ「そ、そう……。[END]
english: Lucca: I, I see......

chapter: Factory Ruins in the Land of Mystery
japanese: ルッカ「さあ！　いくわよ！！[END]
english: Lucca: Now! Here we go!!

japanese: ロボ「ココは？[END]
english: Robo: Where is THIS?

japanese: 老人「おや、またお客さんだ……。[END]
english: Old Man: Dear me, visitors again......

japanese: マール「あの、ここは一体？[END]
english: Marle: Um, just where is this?

japanese: ルッカ「客人って…… あの、ここは？[END]
english: Lucca: Visitors......? Um, where is this?

japanese: 老人「ここは、『時の最果て』……。
english: Old Man: This is "The Farthest Reaches of Time"......

japanese: 時間のまよい子が、行き着く所さ。 お前さん達、どっから来なすった？[END]
english: The place where the lost children of time end up. Where did you all come from?

japanese: ルッカ「私達は、王国暦1000年から 来たんです。[END]
english: Lucca: We came from Kingdom Year 1000.

japanese: ロボ「ワタシはA．D．2300年の 世界からゲートで……[END]
english: Robo: I, from the world of A.D.2300, by a Gate......

japanese: 老人「違う時間を生きる者が、4人以上で 時空のゆがみに入ると、次元の力場が ねじれてしまう……。
english: Old Man: When you enter a space-time distortion with four or more people who live in different times, the dimensional field distorts......

japanese: しかし、この所、時空のゆがみが 多くてな。 お前さん達の様にフラリとここへ あらわれる者もいる……。
english: However, there are many space-time distortions in this place. There are even those who, like you, appear here aimlessly......

japanese: 何かが時間全体にえいきょうを およぼしているのかも知れんな……。[END]
english: Perhaps something is exerting an effect on all of time......

japanese: ルッカ「って事は、誰か一人ここに 残った方が安全って事ね。[END]
english: Lucca: Which means it's safer if one of us remains here.

japanese: マール「ええ、こんなトコで おいてけぼりなの～？[END]
english: Marle: What, leaving someone in a place like thiiis?

japanese: 老人「こんなトコはひどいな……。
english: Old Man: Place like this, that's rather harsh......

japanese: 何、しんぱいいらんよ。 ここはすべての時に通じている……。
english: You don't need to worry about anything. This place leads to all times......

japanese: お前さんがたが願えばいつでも 仲間を呼び出せる。 だが時の旅は不安定じゃ。 つねに3人で行動する事じゃ。[END]
english: If you wish, you can summon your companions at any time. But time travel is unstable. You should always act in groups of three.

japanese: ロボ「デハ、ダレか残らないと なりマセンネ。[END]
english: Robo: THEN, someONE MUST remain.

japanese: ルッカ「誰が残る？　クロノ。[END]
english: Lucca: Who stays, Crono?

japanese: マール「早く呼んでよ、クロノ！[END]
english: Marle: Call me quick, Crono!

japanese: ルッカ「二人っきりだからって ヘンな事考えないでよね、おジイさん！[END]
english: Lucca: Don't get any weird thoughts just because we're alone together, old man!

japanese: ロボ「ゴヨウの時はいつでも お呼びクダサイ。[END]
english: Robo: PLEASE call me any time when I may be of SERVICE.

japanese: 老人「ここに残っている者ならば いつでもメンバーを入れかえる事が 出来るぞ。[END]
english: Old Man: You can switch members with those who remain here at any time.

japanese: 老人「……という事じゃ。
english: Old Man: ......and that's that.

japanese: Yボタンで私を呼び出せば ここに残っている者といつでも メンバーチェンジ出来る。 わすれんようにな。[END]
english: If you call me with the Y button, you can change members at any time with those who remain here. Make sure not to forget.

japanese: マール「私達の時代に戻るには どうやったらいいの？[END]
english: Marle: To return to our era, what should we do?

japanese: 老人「お前さん達がやって来た場所に 光のはしらがあるじゃろう。 あれは、あちこちの次元のゆがみと ここ、時の最果てをつなぐものじゃ。
english: Old Man: There are pillars of light where you arrived, correct? Those connect the scattered dimensional distortions to here, the Farthest Reaches of Time.

japanese: 一度通った事のあるゲートからは いつでもここに来られるじゃろう。 光にかさなりAボタンを押せば ゲートにもどれる。
english: Most likely, you can come here any time from any Gate you have already crossed once. You can return to the Gate if you overlap with the light and press the A button.

japanese: じゃが、そこのバケツからつながる ゲートには気をつけるんじゃな……。[END]
english: But, be wary of the Gate that connects from the bucket over there......

japanese: 老人「そこはA．D．1999…… 『ラヴォスの日』と言われる時へ つながっとる……。
english: Old Man: That place is connected to A.D.1999.... the time called "The Day of Lavos"......

japanese: 世界のほろぶ姿が見たいのなら 行ってみるのもいいが……
english: You could try going if you want to see what the destruction of the world looks like, but......

japanese: お前さん達まで、ほろびちまうかも 知れんぞ。[END]
english: Even you might be destroyed.

japanese: [System] A．D．1999年『ラヴォスの日』へ 行きますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Go to A.D. 1999, “The Day of Lavos”? Yes No

japanese: [System] かたく閉ざされている……。[END]
english: [System] It's shut tight......

japanese: 老人「おーい。[END]
english: Old Man: Hey.

japanese: 老人「そう、せく事もあるまい。 上のドアの向こうにも 寄って行ってみなされ。[END]
english: Old man: No need to rush, is there? Try dropping in on the other side of the door up there, too.

japanese: [Spekkio] 「なんだ、おめーら？
english: [Spekkio] 'Whaddaya want?

japanese: オレか？　オレ、スペッキオ。 戦の神！ こっからいろんな時代の戦、見てる。[END]
english: Me? I'm Spekkio. God of war! I'm watching the wars in various eras from here.

japanese: スペッキオ「おめー、オレどう見える？ 強そう 弱そう[END]
english: Spekkio: You, how do I look? Strong Weak

japanese: スペッキオ「そうか。 オレの姿、おめーの強さ。 おめーが強ければ強そうに 弱ければ弱そうに見える。[END]
english: Spekkio: Is that so. My appearance is your strength. If you're strong, I look strong, if you're weak, I look weak.

japanese: スペッキオ「ん？
english: Spekkio: Hm?

japanese: おめーら、持ってるな。 心の力を……。
english: You guys have it. Power of the heart......

japanese: そうか、表のジジイ、それでここに 通したか。
english: I get it, that's why the old man outside let you in here.

japanese: おめーらの生まれるずっと昔…… 魔法でさかえた王国、あった。 その世界、みんな魔法使った。
english: Long before you guys were born...... There was a kingdom that prospered by magic. Everyone in that world used magic.

japanese: けどその王国、魔力におぼれ ほろびた……。 それから人は魔法を使えなくなった。 魔族以外はな。
english: But that country grew addicted to magical power and was destroyed...... After that, people became unable to use magic. Except for the Demons anyway.

japanese: だが、おめーら、持ってる。 心の強さを。　魔法は心の強さ、力。
english: But you guys've got it. Strength of the heart. Magic's the heart's strength, power.

japanese: 魔法は天・冥・火・水の4つの力で なりたってる。[END]
english: Magic's made up of the four powers Sky, Dark, Fire, and Water.

japanese: スペッキオ「ツンツン頭のおまえは『天』。[END]
english: Spekkio: You, pointy head, you're "Sky".

japanese: スペッキオ「このポニーテールのギャルは 『水』の力。[END]
english: Spekkio: This ponytailed girl's "Water" power.

japanese: スペッキオ「こっちのメガネのネーちゃんは 『火』の力。[END]
english: Spekkio: Glasses chick here's "Fire" power.

japanese: スペッキオ「このデッカい人形は……。 おめー、生き物じゃないな。
english: Spekkio: This hugeass doll...... You, you're not a living thing.

japanese: おめーも強い心持ってるけど 昔の魔法の民の血ひいてないから 魔法ムリ。
english: You've got a strong heart too, but since you're not descended from the ancient magic peoples, magic's a no-go.

japanese: でも、おめーのレーザーとかいう武器 スゴい殺傷能力。 『冥』の力に似てる。[END]
english: But that laser weapon of yours has got serious destructive ability. It resembles "Dark" power.

japanese: スペッキオ「てなぐあいに、魔法だけでなく すべてのものは、この4つのバランスで なりたってる。[END]
english: Spekkio: Like so, it's not just magic, all things are made up of the balance of these four.

japanese: スペッキオ「『魔法が使いたい～』と ねんじながら、ドアの所からはじめて この部屋のさくにそって、時計回りに 3回まわる！
english: Spekkio: While silently praying, "I wanna use magic", circle clockwise along the edge of this room three times, starting from where the door is!

japanese: バターにならないよう、気をつける。[END]
english: I'll pay attention so you can't cheat.

japanese: スペッキオ「ズルだめ！ オレちゃんと見てる！
english: Spekkio: No cheating! I'm keeping close watch!

japanese: もう1回やり直し！　ドアの所から さくにそって時計まわりに3回まわる！[END]
english: Start over again! Three times, clockwise, along edge, from the door!

japanese: スペッキオ「よーし！[END]
english: Spekkio: All right!

japanese: スペッキオ「ハニャハラヘッタミタ～イ！！[END]
english: Spekkio: Hanyaharahettamitaai!

japanese: [System] クロノが魔法を使えるようになった！[END]
english: [System] Crono became able to use magic!

japanese: マールが魔法を使えるようになった！[END]
english: Marle became able to use magic!

japanese: ルッカが魔法を使えるようになった！[END]
english: Lucca became able to use magic!

japanese: ロボは魔法を使えない！[END]
english: Robo can't use magic!

japanese: スペッキオ「どーだ、新たな力わくだろ。 ためしてみるか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Spekkio: How about it, you're excited at you new powers, right? Wanna try testing them? Yes No

japanese: スペッキオ「フフ、わくわく！[END]
english: Spekkio: Hu, hu, I'm excited!

japanese: スペッキオ「なーんだ、おめーら。 腕だめししたいのか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Spekkio: Oh, it's you guys. Wanna test your skill? Yes No

japanese: スペッキオ「いつでもいいぞ。 なにしろオレ、戦の神！[END]
english: Spekkio: Any time's fine. I'm the god of war after all!

japanese: スペッキオ「オゴゴ……
english: Spekkio: ogogo......

japanese: オレ負けるなんて……[END]
english: How could I lose......?

japanese: スペッキオ「何かの間違い！　オレ戦の神！ そーだ、オレが魔法おしえたから おめーら勝てた！[END]
english: Spekkio: It's some kinda mistake! I'm the god of war! Oh, I get it, you could win since I taught you magic!

japanese: スペッキオ「やっぱオレ、戦の神！ フンフフ～ン[note][END]
english: Spekkio: I really am the god of war! Hun, hu, huuuun[note]

japanese: スペッキオ「フ、フン。 少しはやるみたいだな。 しかたない、コレやる。[END]
english: Spekkio: H, hmph. Looks like you're sort of competent. Can't help it, I'll give you this.

japanese: スペッキオ「オレ、戦の神！　気前いい！ フンフフ～ン[note][END]
english: Spekkio: I'm the god of war! So generous! Hun, hu, huuuun[note]

japanese: スペッキオ「フンフフ～ン[note] オレの勝ち！[END]
english: Spekkio: Hun, hu, huuuun[note] I win!

japanese: スペッキオ「新しい仲間出来たら 連れて来る。 おめーら、オモシロイ。[END]
english: Spekkio: If you make new companions, you're bringing them here. You guys are VERY interesting.

english: [System] Spekkio Refreshing Set!

japanese: マジックカプセル1コ エーテル5コつめあわせを手に入れた！[END]

japanese: スペッキオしなやかセット！

english: Spekkio Healthy Set!

japanese: スペッキオたおやかセット！
english: Spekkio Graceful Set!

japanese: エリクサー10コつめあわせを 手に入れた！[END]
english: And 10 Elixirs!

japanese: スペッキオにぎやかセット！
english: Spekkio Lively Set!

japanese: マジックカプセル10コ スピードカプセル10コ パワーカプセル　10コ
english: Got 10 Magic Capsules, 10 Speed Capsules, 10 Power Capsules,

japanese: ラストエリクサー10コに……
english: 10 Last Elixirs, and......

japanese: スペッキオの気持ち 一年分を手に入れた！[END]
english: A year's supply of Spekkio's feelings!

japanese: スペッキオ「いーかげんにする、おめーら。 オレもうカラッケツ！！[END]
english: Spekkio: Cut it out already, you guys. I'm flat out broke now!!

japanese: スペッキオ「なにわらってる、おめーら……
english: Spekkio: What're you guys laughing at......?

japanese: 本当の強さとは姿形などとは むかんけいなのだ……。[END]
english: There's no connection between form and true strength......

japanese: 老人「ほ、やはりな。 はるか昔の人々はみなそういった力を 持っていたもんじゃ。
english: Old Man: Oh? Just as I thought. All the people of the distant past had such power.

japanese: そう、はるか昔……な。
english: Ah yes, the distant past......

japanese: お前さん達、何かとてつもない事を やらかそうというみたいじゃが まずはお前さん達の時代に もどってみてはどうかな……？
english: It looks as though you guys are about to go and perpetrate something unreasonable, but perhaps you should first try returning to your era....?

japanese: 急がばまわれ…… ここにいると、そんな言葉の意味も よくわかってくるものじゃ……。
english: Less haste, more speed...... When you're here, you come to understand well the meaning even such words as those......

japanese: 何かあったら、いつでも来なさい。 私がお前さん達の時間の道しるべに なってやろう。[END]
english: If anything happens, come any time. I shall be a guide to time for you.

japanese: 老人「何かあったら、いつでも来なさい。 私がお前さん達の時間の道しるべに なってやろう。[END]
english: Old Man: If anything happens, come any time. I shall be a guide to time for you.

japanese: マール「私も連れてってよー！ はい いいえ[END]
english: Marle: Take me toooo! Yes No

japanese: マール「よーし、ガンバるぞ！[END]
english: Marle: Okay, I'll do my best!

japanese: マール「ちェッ、つまんない！[END]
english: Marle: Tch, boring!

english: Lucca: You need my brains, don't you? Yes No

japanese: ルッカ「やっぱ、私がいないとダメね！[END]
english: Lucca: It really isn't any good without me there!

japanese: ルッカ「あ、あらそう？[END]
english: Lucca: Oh, ah, really?

japanese: ロボ「何かお役に立てマスカ？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Robo: May I BE of use? Yes No

english: Robo: UNDERSTOOD. [pc1]!

japanese: ロボ「ご用の時はエンリョなく おもうしつけクダサイ。[END]
english: Robo: PLEASE instruct me without RESTRAINT when you have a use for me.

english: [System] Go to A.D. 2300, “Promethe Dome”? Yes No

english: [System] Recovered HP and MP!

japanese: [Woman] 恐竜　みんな　みんな　かみなりで ビリビリ　感電！　知ってたか？[END]
english: [Woman] Dinomen all, all get shock by thunder! You knew that?

japanese: [Old Man] オマエ　ヘンなヤツ。 何か　かわったモン　あるか？ いや　酋長の許しない　交換出来ない。[END]
english: [Old Man] You weird. Got strange stuff? No, can't do trade chief not okay.

japanese: [Woman] かりの森　で　かりする。 『はなびら』　『きば』　『つの』 『はね』　あつまる！
english: [Woman] Hunt in Hunting Forest. Gather “Flower Petal”, “Fang”, “Horn”, “Feather”!

japanese: それに　あめ　ふった時　とてもめずらしい モンスター　出る。 そいつ　おとく！　おとく！！[END]
english: And when rain, very rare monster come out. That one good profit! Good profit!!

japanese: [Man] ここ　交換屋。 とって来た物　いろんな物 とりかえる。[END]
english: [Man] This trade hut. Swap brought stuff, various stuff.

japanese: [Man] オマエの　そのキラキラした 石と交換！[END]
english: [Man] Trade for your shiny stone!

japanese: [Man] 酋長　強いもの　なる。 男でも　女でも　子供でも。 イオカの酋長は　むっちんプリプリ。[END]
english: [Man] Strong one become chief. Man, woman, child, not matter. Ioka chief lithe muscle.

japanese: [Woman] お前達　あの山　来た？ あの山　不思議な事　よく起こる。 だから　不思議山　いう。[END]
english: [Woman] You came that mountain? Many mystery things happen that mountain. So called Mystery Mountain.

japanese: キーノも　そう。 ある日　山で　泣いてた。 酋長　キーノ　育てた。 キーノ　今　酋長の右腕。[END]
english: Kino same too. Was crying at mountain one day. Chief raised Kino. Now Kino chief's right arm.

japanese: [Man] 俺達　恐竜人　戦う。 ラルバ族　戦わない。[END]
english: [Man] We fight Dinomen. Laruba clan no fight.

japanese: [Man] ラルバ族　北の森　かくれてる。 かくれて　あっちこっち。 ラルバ族　恐竜人　逃げてる　弱虫！[END]
english: [Man] Laruba clan hidden north forest. Hide here, there. Laruba clan cowards run from Dinomen!

japanese: [Woman] ラルバ族　プテラン呼ぶ。　空　飛ぶ！ オレ達　呼べない。　空　飛べない。[END]
english: [Woman] Laruba clan call Pteran. Fly sky! We no can call. No can fly sky.

japanese: キーノ「お前ら　どっから来た？ ここ　何し　来た？
english: Kino: Where you come from? Why came here?

japanese: キーノ　お前ら　キライ！[END]
english: Kino not like you!

japanese: [Blue Imp] 兄ちゃん達、ボクの家のタンスから 出て来たよね……？ なんで？　どーして？[END]
english: [Blue Imp] You came out of the chest of drawers in my house......? Why? How?

japanese: [Brown Imp] お、おまえらなあ、事もあろうに 他人の家のタンスから出てくるとは どういうつもりだ？ これだから人間ってヤツは……[END]
english: [Brown Imp] Y, you guys, hey, what's the big idea, coming out of the chest of drawers in a stranger's house? That's why you humans are so......

japanese: [Brown Imp] ちょっと待つんだ。[END]
english: [Brown Imp] Wait a sec.

japanese: [Brown Imp] このメディーナ村は、魔族の村。 400年前、人間との戦いに負けた魔族の 子孫によってつくられた村だ。
english: [Brown Imp] This Medina Village is the Demons' village. The village was built by descendants of the Demons who lost the war with humans 400 years ago.

japanese: この村に住む魔族のほとんどは 人間に対してにくしみをいだいている。 気をつけな。[END]
english: Most of the Demons who live in this village hold a grudge against humans. Be careful.

japanese: [Blue Imp] あ、兄ちゃん達、ちょっと待って。[END]
english: [Blue Imp] Ah, wait a sec, you guys.

japanese: [Blue Imp] 西の山の洞窟の近くに、ちょっと変わった 人間のおじいさんが住んでいるんだ。 きっと兄ちゃん達の力になってくれるよ。[END]
english: [Blue Imp] A rather peculiar old human man is living near the cave in the mountain to the west. He'll definitely help you guys out.

japanese: マール「教えてくれて、ありがとう！[END]
english: Marle: Thanks for telling us!

japanese: マール「でも…… なぜ私達に親切にしてくれるの？ 魔族は人間をにくんでいるのでしょう？[END]
english: Marle: But...... Why are you being kind to us? Demons hate humans, right?

japanese: ルッカ「アドバイス、どうも！ でも、魔族は人間をにくんでいるはず でしょう？ なぜ、あなた達は……？[END]
english: Lucca: Thanks for the advice! But, Demons are supposed to hate humans, right? Why are you......?

japanese: ロボ「助言ヲありがとうゴザイマス。[END]
english: Robo: THANK you for the suggestion.

japanese: ロボ「シカシ、あなた方はナゼ 我々に親切にシテ下さるのデスカ？ 魔族ハ人間をニクんでいるのデハ？[END]
english: Robo: HOWEVER, WHY are you graciously being kind to us? Do NOT the Demons HATe humans?

japanese: [Blue Imp] 人間と魔族が戦ったのは 400年も昔の事だ。　いつまでも過去に とらわれていてもしかたがない。
english: [Blue Imp] It was 400 long years ago that the humans and Demons fought. There's no point in staying caught up in the past forever.

japanese: まあ、私達のような考えを持った魔族は ほとんどいないが……[END]
english: There are hardly any Demons who think like we do, though......

japanese: [Blue Imp] ん、兄ちゃん達も食べてく？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [Blue Imp] Hey, are you eating too before you go? Yes No

japanese: [Blue Imp] 兄ちゃん達は人間なのに、なぜ魔力を 持ってるの？ 魔法を使える人間はずっと昔にいなくなった はずなのに……[END]
english: [Blue Imp] Why do you have magical powers even though you're human? Humans who can use magic were supposed to have died out in the far distant past......

japanese: [Omnicrone] 人間風情が、この俺様に話しかけるな！[END]
english: [Omnicrone] Don't talk to me, you worthless humans.

japanese: [Hench] 人間なんかに売ってやるモノはないね。 とっとと帰りな。 あきらめる たのみこむ[END]
english: [Hench] I've got nothing I'd sell to the likes of humans. Hurry up and go home. Give up Plead

japanese: 人間ごときがえらそうに！ 先生、ノシてやって下さい！[END]
english: You're awfully full of yourself for a mere human! Sensei, please take them down!

japanese: せ、先生が殺られた！？ こいつら、化け物だ～！[END]
english: S, sensei was killed!? These guy's are monsters!

japanese: しかたがない。　売ってやるよ。[END]
english: I've got no choice. I'll sell.

japanese: へっ！　人間なんぞに まともな値で売ってやるもんか！[END]
english: Heh! As if I'd sell to the likes of humans at fair prices!

japanese: [Diablos] 酒がマズくなる！　あっちに行け！[END]
english: [Diablos] You're spoiling the sake! Get lost!

japanese: [Diablos] へっ、人間なんかヘケランのちょうはつに のせられて、いたい目を見りゃいいんだ。 ウケケケ。[END]
english: [Diablos] Heh, I hope those humans fall for Hekeran's taunting and suffer for it. Uke, ke, ke.

japanese: [Hench] 人間なんか、とまらせてやるギリはないね。 とっとと帰りな。 あきらめる たのみこむ[END]
english: [Hench] We've got no obligation to let the likes of humans stay here. Hurry up and go home. Give up Plead

japanese: うるせえ！　ゴチャゴチャぬかすな！！ 殺っちまえ！[END]
english: Shut up! Quit whining!! Kill them!

japanese: [Hench] ひえ～、お助け～！[END]
english: [Hench] Hieey, spare me!

japanese: 1ぱく200Gだ。 とまらせてほしいのか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: One night's 200G. Want me to let you stay? Yes No

japanese: 金がたりないようだな。[END]
english: It seems you don't have enough money.

japanese: [Vinnegar the 8th] ワシがこのメディーナ村の村長 ビネガー8世じゃ！ ワシの先祖は、あのいだいな魔王様の 右ウデとして人間どもと戦ったのだぞ。
english: [Vinnegar the 8th] I am chief of this Medina Village, Vinnegar the 8th! My ancestor fought humans as right-hand man to THE Great Magus-sama.

japanese: ああ、魔王様……　なぜ400年前に 人間達をほろぼして下さらなかったのじゃ？[END]
english: Ahh, Magus-sama...... Why didn't you graciously destroy humans for us 400 years ago?

japanese: [Green Imp] そうじも楽じゃないよ……[END]
english: [Green Imp] Cleaning's no easy task......

japanese: [Blue Imp] ちくしょう、ビネガー8世のヤロウ！ 先祖の地位をカサにきて 俺達をこき使いやがって。[END]
english: [Blue Imp] Damn it, Vinnegar the 8th, you bastard! Damn you for taking advantage of your ancestor's position and overworking us.

japanese: [Green Imp] 西の山の洞窟にすむ魔物は 魔法による攻撃しかうけつけないんだ。 魔法が使えない人間では 通りぬける事はむずかしいだろうね。
english: [Green Imp] The monsters living in the cave in the mountain to the west don't take damage except from magic attacks. I'll bet humans would have a hard time getting through, not being able to use magic.

japanese: さ、ビネガー8世に見つかるまえに そうじを終わらせなきゃ。[END]
english: Now, I have to get the cleaning finished before I'm noticed by Vinnegar the 8th.

japanese: マール「ねえ、クロノ。 この不気味な声は何なのかしら？[END]
english: Marle: Hey, Crono. I wonder what those eerie voices are?

japanese: ルッカ「……不気味な声ね。 ここで何が行なわれているのかしら？[END]
english: Lucca: ......eerie voices. I wonder what's being done here?

japanese: ロボ「コ、コノ不気味ナ声ハ イッタイ何なのでショウカ？[END]
english: Robo: Wh, what ON EARTH could THESE eerie voices BE?

japanese: [Demons] ははーっ！　魔王様～[END]
english: [Demons] Yessir! Magus-sama~

japanese: [Demons] 魔王様が我々のために生み出された ラヴォス神が永き眠りからめざめれば 人間どもの世界などいっしゅんで終わりだ。[END]
english: [Demons] When the god Lavos, who was brought forth for us by Magus-sama, awakens from his long sleep, the world of the humans will be over in an instant.

japanese: [Demons] 魔王様が我ら魔族をひきいて人間に 戦いをいどんでから、400年が過ぎた。 ラヴォス神さえよみがえれば、人間など……[END]
english: [Demons] 400 years have passed since Magus-sama led us Demons and challenged the humans to war. If only the god Lavos were revived, the likes of humans......

japanese: [Demons] その昔、強大な魔力を持つ魔王様が ラヴォス神をたんじょうさせたのだ。[END]
english: [Demons] Long ago, Magus-sama, with his mighty powers of magic, caused the god Lavos to be born.

japanese: ボッシュ「おお、たずねて来おったか！ ワシのじまんのコレクションでも 見て行くとよい。
english: Bosch: Oh, come to visit, have you! I hope you go view my proud collection too.

japanese: そうじゃ、ワシの作った武器でも買って ゆかんか？　安くしとくぞ。 はい いいえ[END]
english: Ah, that's it, you've come to buy the weapons I've made, haven't you? I'll make it cheap.

japanese: ボッシュ「武器はな…… 生命をうばうための物ではないぞ。 生かすための物であるべきじゃ。[END]
english: Bosch: Weapons, you see...... They aren't for taking life. They ought to be for bringing life.

japanese: ボッシュ「そうか、ザンネンじゃの。[END]
english: Bosch: I see, that's too bad.

japanese: ボッシュ「それはの、かるくて使いやすい 名剣じゃ。 モチロン、ワシの作品じゃぞ。[END]
english: Bosch: That's a superior sword, lightweight and easy to use. Naturally, it's my work.

japanese: ボッシュ「そうじゃ、おぬし達。 トルース町に帰りたいのであれば、 この家の北にある山の洞窟を ぬけて行くがよい。[END]
english: Bosch: Ah, yes, you guys. If you want to return to the town of Truce, you should pass through the cave in the mountain north of this house.

japanese: [Hench] 魔族の敵に死を！[END]
english: [Hench] Death to the Demons' enemies!

japanese: [Heckran] ラヴォス神を生んだ魔王様が 400年前に人間共をほろぼしておいて くだされば、今ごろこの世界は 我ら魔族の時代になっていたものを……[END]
english: [Heckran] If Magus-sama, who gave birth to the god Lavos, had graciously destroyed humans for us, the world of today would have been the age of us Demons......

japanese: ク　ソ　ー　ッ　！[END]
english: D A M N !

japanese: ルッカ「やっぱり、中世の魔王が この星の未来をメチャクチャにした ラヴォスを生んだのね……。[END]
english: Lucca: So the Magus of the Middle Ages really did give birth to the Lavos that wrecked this planet's future......

japanese: マール「この星の未来をメチャメチャに したラヴォスを生んだのが 中世の魔王なのね……。[END]
english: Marle: So the one who gave birth to the Lavos that wrecked this planet's future was the Magus of the Middle Ages......

japanese: マール「中世へ行って魔王を 倒せば歴史は変わるのかしら？[END]
english: Marle: I wonder if history will change if we go to the Middle Ages and beat Magus?

japanese: ロボ「魔王を中世で倒ス事ガ 出来レバ、歴史は変わるのでショウカ？[END]
english: Robo: If we CAN defEAT Magus in the Middle Ages, MIGHT history change?

japanese: ルッカ「千年祭広場のゲートを 使えば……。[END]
english: Lucca: If we use the Gate in the Millenial Festival square......

japanese: マール「ねえ、クロノ。 千年祭広場のゲートを使えば……。[END]
english: Marle: Hey, Crono. If we use the Gate in the Millenial Festival square......

japanese: [System] とびこみますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Jump in? Yes No

japanese: [Taban] ルッカに会ったら言っといて くれよ。[END]
english: [Taban] Tell Lucca I said 'hi' when you see her.

japanese: タバン「おう！　ルッカ。[END]
english: Taban: Oh! Lucca.

japanese: タバン「たまには、かお見せろって。 俺はルッカの気に入る防具を せっせと作ってるからな。[END]
english: Taban: Show your face once in a while. I've been hard at work making armors you'd like.

japanese: [Soldier] 逃がすかーッ！[END]
english: [Soldier] As if we'd let you get away!

japanese: [System] かたく閉ざされている……。[END]
english: [System] It's shut tight......

japanese: マール「行こう、クロノ！ あんなわからず屋の父上なんか 会いたくない！[END]
english: Marle: Let's go, Crono! I don't wanna meet that thickheaded father!

japanese: 兵士「！！
english: Soldier: !!

japanese: テ、テロリストいちみだーッ！！[END]
english: It, it's a gang of terrorists!!

japanese: ルッカ「マ、マズいわよ！！[END]
english: Lucca: Crap, not good!!

japanese: ロボ「ナ、何なんデス～！？[END]
english: Robo: WH, what IS this!?

japanese: カエル「テロリストお！？[END]
english: Frog: Terrorists!?

japanese: フリッツ「へい！　らっしゃい……！！[END]
english: Fritz: Hey! Welcome......!!

japanese: フリッツ「クロノさん！！！ あの時は本当にありがとう ございました。
english: Fritz: Crono-san!!! Seriously, thank you for back then.

japanese: おかげでこうして家にもどることも 出来ました。[END]
english: Thanks to you, I was able to come back home like this too.

japanese: フリッツ「まいりましたよ……。 おやじを見返してやろうと思って しいれの旅にでたのはいいんですが……
english: Fritz: I'm beat...... I was thinking I'd outdo my old man, and going on a trip to stock up was all well and good......

japanese: 帰りの宿で、ごうとうだんのとりものに まきこまれましてね。 いっしょに、つかまってしまった わけなんですよ。
english: But at the inn on the way back, I got caught up in the arrest of a gang of robbers. I got arrested along with them.

japanese: それにしても私の話を聞きもしないで 死刑！　なんですから……、ふう…… ほんとうに助かりましたよ。[END]
english: Besides that, the death penalty, without even listening to my story! Why in the...... phew...... You really saved me.

japanese: エレイン「本当に、本当に ありがとうございました。 私、今しあわせです。[END]
english: Elaine: I truly, truly, thank you. I'll be happy now.

japanese: フリッツ「これ、おやじにはないしょで……
english: Fritz: Keep this secret from my old man......

japanese: ミドルエーテルを10コ手に入れた！！[END]
english: Got 10 Middle Ethers!!

japanese: [Man] ん、んん！[END]
english: [Man] Ahem!

japanese: フリッツ「お、おやじ！[END]
english: Fritz: D, dad!

japanese: [Man] ちゃんと、やってるんだろうな？[END]
english: [Man] You're running things proper-like, right?

japanese: フリッツ「も、もちろん。な、なあ。[END]
english: Fritz: Of, of course. R, right?

japanese: エレイン「え、ええ。[END]
english: Elaine: Uh, yeah.

japanese: [Man] まあ、いいだろう……。[END]
english: [Man] Well, all right......

japanese: [Man] クロノさん……。 ほんとうに、ありがとうございました。[END]
english: [Man] Crono-san...... I truly thank you.

japanese: フリッツ「さあ、クロノさん。 こっからは商売だ、俺がしいれた物 買っていってくれ。[END]
english: Fritz: Well, Crono-san. It's business from here on, go on and buy what I stocked up.

japanese: フリッツ「いらっしゃい！ [pc1]さん。[END]
english: Fritz: Welcome! [pc1]-san.

japanese: フリッツ「まいど！！[END]
english: Fritz: Come again!!

japanese: ジナ「クロノ！！[END]
english: Jina: Crono!!

japanese: ジナ「クロノ！　クロノ！！ よかった……。 母さん、あんたが死刑になるって 聞いて……[END]
english: Jina: Crono! Crono!! What a relief...... I heard you were going to be executed......

japanese: ジナ「もう、母さんを心配させるんじゃ ないわよ。[END]
english: Jina: Don't make me worry any more.

japanese: ルッカ「こんにちは、ジナおばさん！[END]
english: Lucca: Good afternoon, Jina oba-san!

japanese: ジナ「おや、ルッカ。 最近、うちにあんまり来ないのね？[END]
english: Jina: Oh, Lucca. You haven't been coming around much lately.

japanese: ルッカ「最近、研究いそがしくって。[END]
english: Lucca: I've been busy with research lately.

japanese: ジナ「そう、あんまりガンバリすぎて 体こわさないようにね。 ララとタバンにもよろしく言って ちょうだいな。[END]
english: Jina: Yes, well make sure you don't push yourself too hard and damage your health. Give my best regards to Lara and Taban too, please.

japanese: ジナ「あら……、ルッカの発明品？[END]
english: Jina: Oh my..... an invention of Lucca's?

japanese: ロボ「お初にお目にかかりマス。 私はロボともうしマス。 クロノには、大変お世話に なっておりマス。[END]
english: Robo: We mEET for the first time. I am calLED Robo. I have reciEVED considerable assistance from Crono.

japanese: ジナ「あらあら、ごていねいに。 ちょっと変わったカッコだけど とっても、れいぎ正しいわね。 クロノも少しは見ならいなさい。[END]
english: Jina: My, my, so courteous. Even though you look a bit peculiar, you're very polite. Crono, follow his example a little.

japanese: [System] A．D．1000年『リーネ広場』へ 行きますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Go to A.D. 1000, “Leene Square”? Yes No

japanese: [System] A．D．600年『トルース村裏山』へ 行きますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Go to A.D. 600, “Truce Village Back Hills”? Yes No

japanese: [System] A．D．1000年『ガルディアの森』へ 行きますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Go to A.D. 1000, “Guardia Forest”? Yes No

japanese: [System] A．D．2300年『バンゴドーム』へ 行きますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Go to A.D. 2300, “Bango Dome”? Yes No

japanese: [Young Man] なーに、心配いりません。
english: [Young Man] What, there's nothing to worry about.

japanese: 勇者のあかしといわれる 『勇者バッジ』をもった方が ついに、あらわれたんです！
english: The one holding the “Hero Badge”, said to be proof of the hero, has finally appeared!

japanese: これでこの世界にもやっと 平和がかえってきます。 よかった、本当によかった……。[END]
english: Now peace will finally come back to this world. Thank goodness, really, thank goodness......

japanese: [Woman] なんでも魔王軍がゼナンの橋まで 来てるって話じゃないか。 一体どうなっちまうのかね。[END]
english: [Woman] Word is that Magus's army's come all the to the Zenan Bridge, isn't it? Just what's going to happen now?

japanese: [Man] あんた聞いたかね！ あらわれたんだよ！　ついに！ 伝説の勇者様がねっ！
english: [Man] Have you heard?! He's appeared! Finally! The legendary Hero!

japanese: それで、王様に会うため 城に向かったって話だ。 いやー、これで魔王軍もオシマイだな！[END]
english: And they say he headed to the castle to meet the King. Wow, Magus's army is done for now!

japanese: [Young Man] 何でも王も倒れられたって言うし…… もうオシマイかー。[END]
english: [Young Man] They say even the king has fallen...... Are we done for?

japanese: [Young Man] いや伝説の勇者様が現われたから もうだいじょうぶだ！[END]
english: [Young Man] No, the legendary Hero has appeared, so everything's fine now!

japanese: [Man] 国王軍が前線でやぶれ 魔王軍が橋まで攻めて来てるって 話だが本当か？[END]
english: [Man] Is it true that the royal army was beaten in the front lines and Magus's army is coming to attack as far up as the bridge?

japanese: [Man] この鐘の完成も近いんだが……。 国王軍が魔王軍にやぶれて ガルディア王も負傷された。 鐘どころじゃねえやな……。[END]
english: [Man] This bell is almost complete, but...... The royal army was beaten by Magus's army, and King Guardia was wounded too. This is no time for BELLS......

japanese: [Young Woman] 私は、このリーネの鐘が 平和な世になりひびく…… そんな日が来るって信じてるの。 どんな時でも希望は失わないように……。[END]
english: [Young Woman] I hope that this, Leene's Bell, will ring out on a peaceful world...... I believe that such a day will come. May we never lose hope......

japanese: [Knight] あとは魔王軍をげきたい出来れば……[END]
english: [Knight] Now, if we can just repel Magus's army......

japanese: 騎土団長「食料が底をついてしまった…… ガルディア城からのホキュウはまだか！[END]
english: Knight Captain: The food's bottomed out...... Aren't the supplies from Guardia Castle here yet?!

japanese: [Knight] 勇者様を守って、騎土団のせいえいが 突撃を開始しました。[END]
english: [Knight] Protecting the Hero, the best of the Knights have initiated an assault.

japanese: [Knight] 橋のまん中で騎土団と魔王軍が げきとつしたようだ。がんばってくれ……。[END]
english: [Knight] It looks as though the Knights and Magus's army have run into each other in the middle of the bridge. Keep at it......

japanese: [Knight] しかし、勇者様一人の力で 魔王軍をうちやぶれるのだろうか？[END]
english: [Knight] But can the Hero crush Magus's army with just his own power?

japanese: [Knight] 我々の力では、魔王軍に勝てない…… 情けない事だが、勇者様だけがたよりだ。[END]
english: [Knight] We can't beat Magus's army with our power...... It's shameful, but our only recourse is the Hero.

japanese: [Knight] 勇者バッジを持った勇者……。 おとぎ話だとばかり思っていた……。 今となっては勇者様の力を信じるしかない。[END]
english: [Knight] The hero who holds the Hero Badge...... I always thought it was a fairy tale...... Now there's no choice but to trust in the Hero's power.

japanese: [Knight] もう食料がありません……[END]
english: [Knight] There's no food any more......

japanese: 兵士「何だ、お前か。[END]
english: Soldier: Oh, it's you.

japanese: [Soldier] 魔王軍におされていたが もう、だいじょぶだ。 勇者様があらわれたんだからな！[END]
english: [Soldier] We were being pressed by Magus's army, but everything's fine now. For the Hero has appeared!

japanese: [Soldier] 勇者様？ 今ここを通って王に会いにいかれたよ。[END]
english: [Soldier] The Hero? He just now went through here to see the King.

japanese: [Soldier] 騎土団長はゼナン橋に行かれた。 下は負傷者でいっぱいだ。[END]
english: [Soldier] The Knight Captain is at Zenan Bridge. Below, it's full with the wounded.

japanese: [Woman] すみません、ベッドがいっぱいで……[END]
english: [Woman] I'm sorry, the beds are full......

japanese: [Wounded Soldier] 騎土団長まで、前線に行かれたと いうのに……[END]
english: [Wounded Soldier] Even though even the Knight Captain is at the front lines......

japanese: [Wounded Soldier] 魔王め、ついに3大しょう軍を戦いに とうじて来やがった。[END]
english: [Wounded Soldier] That damn Magus finally threw his three great generals into the battle.

japanese: [Wounded Soldier] 前線の食料もそろそろ底をつくころ……[END]
english: [Wounded Soldier] Food's about to hit bottom on the front lines too......

japanese: [Wounded Soldier] 勇者があらわれたって、話だが……[END]
english: [Wounded Soldier] A hero's appeared, or so they say......

japanese: [Wounded Soldier] うう……[END]
english: [Wounded Soldier] Oohh......

japanese: [Woman] 王様もガンバってんだ。 しっかりしな！[END]
english: [Woman] The King's doing all he can too. Keep it together!

japanese: [Soldier] 料理長は前線へとどける食料と、王に体力を つけようと、大いそがしさ。[END]
english: [Soldier] Between the food sent to the front lines and trying to recover the king's strength, the Head Cook is very busy.

japanese: [Woman] あんた、王様のお食事はこれでいいかい？[END]
english: [Woman] You there, will this do for the King's food?

japanese: [Woman] 王様にはスタミナをつけてもらわなきゃ！[END]
english: [Woman] We've gotta build up the King's stamina!

japanese: [Woman] 料理長、ゼナン橋への食料も急がないと！[END]
english: [Woman] Head Cook, we must hurry with the food that goes to Zenan bridge too!

japanese: 料理長「何？　アニキが！？
english: Head Cook: What? Big bro!?

japanese: 料理長「ヘッ、てめえ達だけで この国を守ってると思ったむくいだ。[END]
english: Head Cook: Heh, that's what you bastards get for thinking it's just you protecting this country.

japanese: おかみさん「あんた！[END]
english: Wife: You!

japanese: おかみさん「いつまでも、つまんない意地 はりあってんじゃないよ、男だろ！[END]
english: Wife: Don't keep up this pointless stubborn thing with each other forever, aren't you a man?!

japanese: 料理長「……
english: Head Cook: ......

japanese: るせえ！　お前に何がわかる！[END]
english: Shaddup! What do you know!

japanese: [Woman] バカだね、男ってな！[END]
english: [Woman] They're such idiots, men!

japanese: [Woman] ああ言ってますけど、料理長は いつも騎土団長をしんぱいしてますよ。[END]
english: [Woman] He talks like that, but the Head Cook always worries about the Knight Captain.

japanese: [Woman] 本当は二人とも、なかなおりする きっかけをさがしてるのよ。[END]
english: [Woman] The truth is those two are looking for a chance to make up.

japanese: [Chef] そらそら～ッ！！[END]
english: [Chef] Hey, HEY!!

japanese: [Chef] 「待ちな！[END]
english: [Chef] 'Wait!

japanese: 料理長「ハアハア……
english: Head Cook: haa, haa......

japanese: これを持ってってくれ！[END]
english: Take this with you!

japanese: 料理長「それから、こいつはお前らにだ。 持ってけ。[END]
english: Head Cook: And, this is for you guys. Take it.

japanese: 料理長「それから、あのバカに 伝えといてくれ。
english: Head Cook: And, tell that idiot this for me:

japanese: 生きて帰って来ねえと しょうちしねえってな！[END]
english: I ain't gonna let you not come back alive!

japanese: [Chancellor] おお、クロノどの！ ついに伝説の勇者様が姿を あらわしたのじゃ！
english: [Chancellor] Ohh, Crono-dono! The legendary Hero has finally made his appearance!

japanese: つい先ほど、ここに立ち寄られ 王に会いに行かれましたぞ。[END]
english: Just a short time ago, he visited here and went to see the king.

japanese: [Knight] 王は、お部屋でねこまれている。[END]
english: [Knight] The King is bedridden in his room.

japanese: [Knight] リーネ様も王の部屋で、ねずのかんびょうを しておられる。[END]
english: [Knight] Leene-sama, too, is in the King's room, looking after him all night long.

japanese: [Knight] おいたわしや！　王は魔王軍を前に みずから剣をとり戦ったのです。
english: [Knight] How terrible! The king took up his sword and personally battled Magus's army earlier.

japanese: もし伝説の勇者様が現れたという 知らせを受けなければ、王は引かずに あのまま戦死されていたやも知れません。[END]
english: Had we not received word that the legendary Hero had appeared, the king might have kept on without falling back, and fought to the death.

japanese: [Knight] 私は自分がはずかしい……。
english: [Knight] I am ashamed of myself......

japanese: はじめ、あのお方を勇者様とは気付かず ただのこぎたないガキだと思って けとばしてしまったのです。
english: I'm afraid that at first, not realizing that person was the Hero and thinking he was just a filthy brat, I turned him away.

japanese: しかし私は許されました。 なんと心の広い人物でしょう。 さすがは勇者様です。[END]
english: However, I was forgiven. What a generous personage. It is as befits the Hero.

japanese: [Woman] このままではリーネ様も、まいって しまいます。[END]
english: [Woman] At this rate, Leene-sama will collapse of exhaustion too.

japanese: [King] おお、クロノ。 もう、私も年老いたかな……。
english: [King] Ohh, Crono. I wonder if I have grown old already......

japanese: サイラスの消そくが、つかめぬ以上 あのバッジを持った少年こそ 残されたゆいいつの希望……。
english: As long as we are unable to catch hold of any news of Cyrus, it is that boy who holds the who is our sole remaining hope......

japanese: 少年は、魔王を倒せる伝説の剣を もとめて南の大陸へ向かったよ。[END]
english: The boy headed for the southern continent, seeking the legendary sword that can beat Magus.

japanese: [Queen] きっとサイラスが、あの少年をよこして くれたのですわ。[END]
english: [Queen] Surely Cyrus sent that boy to us.

japanese: [Knight] やはり人間の力では、魔王軍には かなわないのか……[END]
english: [Knight] Can we really not handle Magus's army with human power......?

japanese: [Knight] 勇者様は、何とか橋をわたりました。 しかしわが軍は、大きないた手をこうむって しまいました……[END]
english: [Knight] The Hero crossed the bridge somehow. But I'm afraid our army suffered a very serious blow......

japanese: [Knight] うう……[END]
english: [Knight] Uggh......

japanese: 騎土団長「魔王軍が 新手をくり出して来た。 今は危険だ。　下がっていなさい。[END]
english: Knight Captain: Magus's army has sent out a fresh supply of troops. It's dangerous now. Stay back.

japanese: 騎土団長「クロノ殿、何事かな？
english: Knight Captain: Crono-dono, what is it?

japanese: 料理長の食料をわたしますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Give him the Head Cook's food? Yes No

japanese: 騎土団長「こ、これは！？
english: Knight Captain: Th, this!?

japanese: そうですか、あいつが……[END]
english: I see, he......

japanese: 騎土団長「クロノ殿、もし私がここで 死んだならば、弟に……[END]
english: Knight Captain: Crono-dono, if I die here, tell my little brother......

japanese: 騎土団長「何事だ！！[END]
english: Knight Captain: What's going on!!

japanese: [Knight] 魔王軍の攻撃が始まりました！ もうささえきれません！[END]
english: [Knight] Magus's army's attack has begun! We can't hold any longer!

japanese: 騎土団長「弱音をはくな！ ガルディア王国騎土団のめいよにかけ 魔王軍をげきたいするのだ！[END]
english: Knight Captain: Don't whine! On the honor of the Guardia Royal Knights, repel Magus's army!

japanese: [Knight] し、しかし、もう兵の数が……。[END]
english: [Knight] B, but, the number of soldiers is already......

japanese: 騎土団長「ここが最後の防えい線なのだ。 もうひとがんばりしてくれ！[END]
english: Knight Captain: This is our last line of defense. Hold out a while longer!

japanese: [Knight] わかりました！[END]
english: [Knight] Understood!

japanese: 騎土団長「ごらんのとおり、我が軍は 苦戦しております……
english: Knight Captain: As you can see, our army is fighting a difficult battle......

japanese: クロノ殿、助太刀願えませぬか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Crono-dono, may I not implore your assistance? Yes No

japanese: 騎土団長「かたじけない！　魔王軍は 橋の向こうのたもとにおります！
english: Knight Captain: We are grateful! Magus's army is at the far foot of the bridge!

japanese: これをお持ち下さい。 きっとクロノ殿のお役にたつはず。[END]
english: Please take this. It should surely be of use to you.

japanese: 騎土団長「魔王軍は手強い敵です。 くれぐれもお気をつけて。[END]
english: Knight Captain: Magus's army is a tough foe. I insist that you be careful.

japanese: 騎土団長「そうですか……。 だが我等もガルディア王国騎土団。 メンツにかけてこの橋は死守しますぞ！[END]
english: Knight Captain: I see...... Be we are the Knights of Guardia Kingdom. Upon our honor, we will defend this bridge to the death!

japanese: [Ozzie] ワシは、魔王様だいいちの部下 魔王3大しょうぐんの、ビネガー。 いだいなる魔王様の敵に、死を！[END]
english: [Ozzie] I am Magus-sama's foremost subordinate, Vinnegar of Magus's Three Great Generals. Death to the enemies of the great Magus-sama!

japanese: ビネガー「ワシのかわいいムスコ達よ！ こやつらに死をあたえるのだ！[END]
english: Vinnegar: My dear children! Confer death upon them!

japanese: ビネガー「くう～、なかなかやるな。[END]
english: Vinnegar: Khuu, better than I expected.

japanese: マール「待ちなさいったら！[END]
english: Marle: Wait up!

japanese: ルッカ「逃げ足だけははやいわね。[END]
english: Lucca: You're fast at running away, at least.

japanese: ロボ「追いつきマシタ。[END]
english: Robo: We HAVE caught up.

japanese: ビネガー「少々、お前達をあまく 見すぎていたようだ。 しかし、今度はそうはいかんぞ。[END] ビネガー「殺っちまえ！[END]
english: Vinnegar: It looks as though I took you a bit too lightly. But that won't happen this time. Vinnegar: Kill them off!

japanese: ビネガー「ちくしょー！[END]
english: Vinnegar: Dammit!

japanese: ビネガー「こ、今度こそお前達も おしまいだぞ！　ホントだぞ！[END]
english: Vinnegar: Th, this time for sure, it'll be over for you too! Really!

japanese: マール「何よ！ クロノをナメると イタイ目見るわよ！[END]
english: Marle: What's your problem! Underestimate Crono and you'll pay for it!

japanese: ルッカ「ふん、負けおしみね。[END]
english: Lucca: Hmph, you're a poor loser.

japanese: ロボ「アナタに勝ち目はありマセン。 コウフクシナサイ。[END]
english: Robo: YOU have NO chance. SURRENDER.

japanese: ビネガー「ゆけ、ジャンクドラガー！ 魔王様の敵をたたきのめせ！[END]
english: Vinnegar: Go, Junkdragar! Take down Magus-sama's enemies!

japanese: 騎土団長「クロノ殿のおかげで 橋を守りきる事が出来ました。 しかし、魔王を倒さない事には こんぽん的な解決にはなりません。[END]
english: Knight Captain: Thanks to you, we were able to protect the bridge to the end. But there will be no overall resolution unless we can beat Magus.

japanese: [Knight] ゼナンの橋を魔王軍から とりもどす事ができました。 これもクロノ殿のおかげです。[END]
english: [Knight] We were able to take back Zenan Bridge from Magus's army. This, too, is thanks to Crono-dono.

japanese: [Woman] いらっしゃいまーしい。 今日はどんなごようで？[END]
english: [Woman] Welcome. What do you need today?

japanese: まいど、ありあとやしたー！[END]
english: Y'all come again!

japanese: [Woman] 伝説の勇者様があらわれたんだって？
english: [Woman] The legendary Hero has appeared?

japanese: いよいよ歴史にのこるような 戦いのひぶたが きっておとされるのかねえ……。[END]
english: Could that mean a battle to make history is finally going to be sparked......?

japanese: [Little Boy] 魔物達がね、いっぱいいてね あぶないから、外に出ちゃダメだって。
english: [Little Boy] There's lots of monsters. They say I can't go outside cause it's dangerous.

japanese: チェッ、つまんないよー。[END]
english: Tch, bo-o-oring.

japanese: [Woman] なんでも魔王は、失われた太古の魔術を あやつるという話よな。
english: [Woman] The word is that Magus commands ancient lost magical arts.

japanese: そこいらの魔物どもの術など くらべものにならぬ おそろしいものだそうな。[END]
english: Supposedly it's something terrifying, incomparable to the arts of the monsters around here.

japanese: [Young Woman] ああ、騎土サイラス様は どこへ行かれてしまったのでしょう？
english: [Young Woman] Aaah, where has the knight Cyrus-sama gone?

japanese: まさか…… 王国を見すて、一人でどこかへ 逃げてしまわれたとか……？[END]
english: Don't tell me...... He can't have abandoned the kingdom and run away by himself somewhere......?

japanese: カエル「……。[END]
[Old Man] 王が負傷されたというウワサは本当か？
english: [Old Man] Are the rumors that the King was injured true?

japanese: おお、この国は、われらは 一体どうなってしまうというのだ……？[END]
english: Ohh, just what will become of us and this kingdom......?

japanese: [System] なんとカギがかかっている！[END]
english: [System] What the, it's locked!

japanese: [Old Man] やや……！！ おぬしがそこにかくしもっとるのは きんだんのミアンヌ・ブロマイド[heart]！？[END]
english: [Old Man] Hey......!! Is that a banned Mianu bromide[heart] you're secretly carrying!?

japanese: そのブロマイド、わしにくれるなら いいものをやるが……、どうかね？ とっかえっこしよう！ じーさんのお宝などいらない[END]
english: If you give me that bromide, I'll give you something good...... how about it? Let's trade! Don't need the old man's treasure

japanese: む……！ なら、勝手にせい。[END]
english: Mh......! Then suit yourself.

japanese: ホントかね、ホントかね？
english: Really, really?

japanese: わーい、やったぞ、ベービィ！ よし、ちょこっと待っておれよ。[END]
english: Yay, I've done it, baby! Okay, wait just a minute.

japanese: カギはあいとる じゆうにもって行くがいい。
english: It's unlocked. You can take it as you please.

japanese: それじゃ、ブロマイドはもらっとくぞ。 うひょひょ……。[END]
english: Well then, I'll be taking the bromide. Uhyo, hyo......

japanese: [Old Man] ばーさんには、ないしょじゃぞ。 むふふ……、ミアンヌちゃん……。[END]
english: [Old Man] Keep it secret from grannie. Mu, hu, hu...... Mianu-chan......

japanese: 村長「探し出してもらいたい物は まぼろしの虹色の貝がら……。
english: Chief: It's the mythical Rainbow-Colored Shell that I want to have you find for us.

japanese: これは前金じゃ。 よろしくたのむぞ、トマよ。[END]
english: This is advance payment. I'm counting on you, Toma.

japanese: トマ「ヘヘッ、まかせときなって。 俺も伝説の探検家とよばれる男。 きたいはうらぎらないぜ、村長。[END]
english: Toma: Heh, heh, leave it to me. I'm the man they call the legendary explorer. I won't betray your hopes, chief.

japanese: 村長「うむ……。 よい知らせ、待っておるぞ。[END]
english: Chief: Yes...... I'll be waiting for the good news.

japanese: トマ「よし、そうと決まれば いっぱい、ひっかけてくるかな。[END]
english: Toma: All right, now that that's settled, I guess I'll go have a drink.

japanese: トマ「おりゃ、ちょっといそがしいんだ また後でな。[END]
english: Toma: Hey, I'm a little busy. Try again later.

japanese: 村長「虹色の貝がらさえあれば 魔法ぼうぎょバツグンの プリズム防具がつくれるのじゃ。
english: Chief: If only we had the Rainbow-Colored Shell, we could make prism armoring with outstanding magic defense.

japanese: しかしあのわかぞう、ほんとうに だいじょうぶなんじゃろか？ 自分では、いだいなる探検家などと いきまいとったが……。[END]
english: But will that youngster really be all right? He declared himself a great explorer and such, but......

japanese: [Little Girl] ゆうしゃたまが、あらわれたんだ！
english: [Little Girl] The Hero's appeared!

japanese: わるいまものをやっつけてくれる すっごく、つおーいひとなのよ！[END]
english: He's a rea-a-ally stro-o-ong person who's gonna beat up the bad monsters for us!

japanese: [Young Woman] 言い伝えでは、魔王をたおせるのは 太古より伝わる剣グランドリオンだけ なんですってね。
english: [Young Woman] According to legend, the only thing that can beat Magus is the sword Grandleon passed down from ancient times.

japanese: えらばれた勇者様だけが グランドリオンを装備できるのだそうよ！[END]
english: Supposedly only the chosen Hero can equip the Grandleon!

japanese: [Woman] 魔王には恐ろしい手下がいる。 ビネガー、マヨネー、ソイソーの3人さ。
english: [Woman] Magus has three terrifying subordinates. Vinnegar, Mayonnay, and Soysaw.

japanese: できることなら、あいつらとは かかわりあいにならない方がいい。 血もなみだもないバケモノどもだよ。[END]
english: You'd better not get mixed up with them if you can help it. They're cold-hearted monsters.

japanese: [Old Woman] ここは、サンドリノの村長の家だよ。
english: [Old Woman] This is the house of Sandrino's village chief.

japanese: はて、変わったかっこうをしとるが お前さん達も魔王軍に追われて 逃げのびてきたのかい？[END]
english: Dear me, you look peculiar; have you all fled too, pursued by Magus's army?

japanese: [Young Man] 魔王の城は東の海の島にあるんだ。 でも島のまわりはだんがいぜっぺきで 誰にも近づけないんだよ……。[END]
english: [Young Man] Magus's castle is on an island in the eastern sea. But it's sheer cliffs all around the island, and no one can get close......

japanese: [Young Woman] 魔王の軍が今にも攻め込んでくるという うわさは、本当かしら……？
english: [Young Woman] I wonder if the rumor that Magus's army will invade soon is true......?

japanese: でも、伝説の勇者様があらわれたからには もうだいじょうぶですよね！[END]
english: But now that the legendary Hero has appeared everything's okay!

japanese: [Man] とっておきの話、聞きます？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [Man] Want to hear something I've been saving? Yes No

japanese: 東にあるデナドロ山には 巨大なハンマーをもったオウガンどもが うろついています。 でも、ハンマーさえもやしてしまえば へっちゃらですよ。[END]
english: Ougan with huge hammers prowl the Denadoro Mountains to the east. But if you just burn their hammers, they're no problem.

japanese: いいよ。　じゃ、とっておくから……。[END]
english: Fine. Then I'll keep saving it......

japanese: [Young Man] 知ってるかい？ 伝説の剣グランドリオンは デナドロ山の奥に眠ると言われてる。
english: [Young Man] Did you know? It's said that the legendary sword Grandleon sleeps within the Denadoro Mountains.

japanese: でも、すっげーおっかない魔物が 剣を守ってるって話だよ。[END]
english: But, the story says a reeaal scary monster is guarding the sword.

japanese: [Nun] いのりなさい。 世界の終わりが始まるのです。[END]
english: [Nun] Pray. The end of the world is beginning.

japanese: [Young Man] 魔王は、邪悪で強大な力を生みだそうと しているらしいぞ……。
english: [Young Man] It sounds like Magus is trying to bring forth an immense evil power......

japanese: もしそうなったら、どこへ逃げても同じ！ みんな死んじまうんだよ……。
english: If that happens, anywhere you run'll be the same! Everyone'll die......

japanese: ……ってなワケで 俺はこうして酒に逃げてるのさ。 ヒック！[END]
english: ......and that's why I'm escaping into alcohol like this. hic!

japanese: トマ「よう、元気だったか。 いっぱいおごってくれるんなら いいネタをやるぜ。[END]
english: Toma: Yo, how've you been? If you treat me to a drink, I'll give you some good info.

japanese: どーだい？ おごる おごらない[END]
english: How about it? Treat him Don't treat him

japanese: トマ「こいつは、すまねえな。[END]
english: Toma: Thanks for that.

japanese: トマ「ち、金がたりないぜ。[END]
english: Toma: Tch, not enough money.

japanese: トマ「おやじ、もういっぱいくんな！[END]
english: Toma: Old man, bring another drink!

japanese: トマ「ちかごろ南の森の奥にゃ ヘンな魔物が かくれ住んでるって話だな。
english: Toma: There's a story that a strange monster's been living in the forest to the south lately in hiding.

japanese: なんでも、うすっきみわるい 化け物ガエルらしいぜ。　ヘッ。[END]
english: I hear it's an unearthly monster frog. Heh.

japanese: トマ「はん。じゃ、むこうへ行ってくれ。 おれもヒマじゃないんだ。[END]
english: Toma: Huh. Then go away. I haven't got time for you.

japanese: トマ「虹色の貝がらか……。 手始めにパレポリから あたってみるとするか。[END]
english: Toma: The Rainbow-Colored Shell, huh...... I guess I'll try heading for Parepoley to start with.

japanese: [Old Man] 旅の宿には、いろんな人がたちよる。 もし人をさがしておるのなら、 ここの主人に聞くがよろしかろう。
english: [Old Man] Various people drop in at travel inns. If you're looking for someone, you should probably ask the owner here.

japanese: ところで、知っていなさるかな。 たつまきのエネルギーは、かまいたちを ぶつけてやれば、消えてしまう……。
english: By the way, I wonder if you knew this? If you strike tornado energy with a whirlwind cut, it dissipates......

japanese: 自然ってのは、いろんなものの 調和とバランスでなりたっとるのさ。[END]
english: Nature, you see, consists of the harmony and balance of various things.

japanese: 主人「あんたら、勇者様をさがしてるとか？ だったら、南のパレポリの村に 行ってみちゃどうだい。
english: Owner: You guys looking for the Hero? Then how about you go to the village of Parepoley to the south?

japanese: なんでも勇者様は、パレポリから あらわれたって話だぜ。[END]
english: Word is the Hero appeared out of Parepoley.

japanese: [Woman] は～い、ここは愛といこいのホテル。 料金は50Gになるんだけれど よろしいかしらん、あはん？[END]
english: [Woman] He-e-ello, this is the hotel of rest and love. The charge is 50G, is that okay with you, tee-hee?

japanese: おとまりになっちゃうん？ とまる とまらない[END]
english: Will you stay over? Stay Don't stay

japanese: キャンッ！ それじゃ、ごゆっくりどうぞ～ん。[END]
english: Kyahn! Well then, take your time.

japanese: あらん？　お金、たりないわよ。[END]
english: Wha? You don't have enough money.

japanese: まあ、ざんねん！　またのおこしを お待ちしておりますわん。 うふん。[END]
english: Oh, that's too bad! We'll be waiting for you to come again. *giggle*

japanese: [Woman] なんとかドリアンとかいう剣は はるか昔にほろんじまった人達の手で つくられたんだそうだよ。
english: [Woman] Supposedly the sword called the something or other durian, or something like that, was made by people who perished in the distant past.

japanese: 今ではもう誰にも、あんな剣を 作り出すことは出来ないんだとさ。[END]
english: They say no one can make a sword like that any more now.

japanese: [Young Woman] あなた達、もう勇者様に会った？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [Young Woman] Have you all met the Hero yet? Yes No

japanese: すごい！　私も一目でいいから 勇者様に会ってみたかったな……！ うるうるしてきちゃう……！[END]
english: Wow! I wanted to meet the Hero too, even if it's just a glimpse......! I'm getting so worked up......!

japanese: そう……。　私も、まだなの。
english: Oh...... I haven't yet either.

japanese: 世界を救ってくれる勇者様って いったいどんな人なのかしら……？ うるうるしてきちゃう……！[END]
english: I wonder what kind of person the Hero who's going to save the world is......? I'm getting so worked up......!

japanese: フィオナ「おっとのマルコは、兵士として 戦いに出たまま、帰って来ません……。
english: Fiona: My husband Marco is still out fighting as a soldier and hasn't come back......

japanese: 私達ニ人は、この森で育ったの。 せめて、この森だけは守りたい。 いつかマルコが帰って来る日まで……。[END]
english: The two of us grew up in this forest. I want to at least protect this forest. Until the day when Marco comes back......

japanese: [Little Boy] 僕も、このよろいを着て魔王と戦うんだ！[END]
english: [Little Boy] I'm gonna put on this armor and fight Magus too!

japanese: うーーー お　も　い　……。[END]
english: uuuuuuuuuu h e a v y ......

japanese: [Little Girl] お兄ちゃん、無理しちゃって！[END]
english: [Little Girl] Big brother, you're trying too hard!

japanese: おかみ「タータの姿をしばらく見ないけど どっか出かけてるのかしら……。
english: Hostess: I haven't seen Tarta in a while, wonder where he's gotten to......?

japanese: でも、あのイタズラこぞうがいないと ホッとするわね、ほんと。[END]
english: But when that mischievous kid's not around, it's really a relief.

japanese: [Old Man] 以前ヘンな魔物が、酒を飮んでいたことが ありましたっけな。
english: [Old Man] A weird monster was drinking sake earlier.

japanese: リーネ様がどうしたの グランドリオンがどうだのと ひとりブツブツ言いながら……。[END]
english: Was mumbling to itself, what's happened with Leene-sama, what about the Grandleon......

japanese: ありゃほんと、うす気味悪い カエル男でしたぞ！　うひゃひゃ。[END]
english: That was a really creepy frogman! Uhya, hya.

japanese: もう、ビックリだよ！ 伝説の勇者様が、実はこの村の 少年だったとはな！[END]
english: What a surprise! To think the legendary Hero was actually a boy from this village!

japanese: あんた、知ってたかい？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Did you know? Yes No

japanese: そうか、もうそんな有名な話なのか！ こりゃ、あのオヤジもハナが たかいだろうな。[END]
english: I see, it's already that well known! I'll bet his old man's proud too.

japanese: じゃあ、おぼえておきな。 伝説の勇者様は、この村の生まれよ！[END]
english: Then remember it. The legendary Hero is born of this village!

japanese: [Young Woman] あのイタズラこぞうのタータが、 伝説の勇者様だったなんて……。 世の中、信じられないわっ。[END]
english: [Young Woman] How could that mischievous kid Tarta have been the legendary Hero......? I can't believe the state of the world.

japanese: [Man] デナドロ山の東にある魔岩窟って 知ってるかい？
english: [Man] Know about the Demon Cavern east of the Denadoro Mountains?

japanese: あそこの岩が、ぽっかり口を開けて 中に魔物が入っていくのを見ちゃったよ。
english: I saw the rock there gaping open and monsters going inside.

japanese: でも、さわらぬ魔王にたたりなし！[END]
english: But it's better to let sleeping Maguses lie.

japanese: トマ「よう、また会ったな。 いっぱい、おごってくれねえか？ おごる おごらない[END]
english: Toma: Yo, we meet again. Treat me to a drink? Treat him Don't treat him

japanese: トマ「おう、ありがとよ。 お前さん達の旅の無事をいのって。[END]
english: Toma: Hey, thanks. I'll pray you have a safe journey.

japanese: トマ「サンドリノの村長のほしがってる 虹色の貝がらだが、どこかの小島に あるらしいってことまでは つきとめたんだが……。
english: Toma: About the Rainbow-Colored Shell the Sandrino village chief wanted, I've determined that it's on a small island somewhere, but......

japanese: その島がどこにあるか さっぱり、わからないんだ。
english: I haven't got a clue where that island is.

japanese: しかし、村長からあずかった前金は もう、みんな使っちまったしな。 さて、どうしたもんか……。[END]
english: But I've already used up all the advance payment I got from the chief. What to do now......?

japanese: トマ「ちェ、ケチだな。
english: Toma: Tch, stingy.

japanese: サンドリノの村長の前金 もういっぱい飮めるくらいは 残ってたかな……？[END]
english: Is there enough of the Sandrino village chief's advance payment left for another drink......?

japanese: [Tarta's Father] 俺のせがれが勇者だってんだ。 トンビがタカを生んだってヤツかね……。 だが、どうひいき目に見ても、そんな ごたいそうなヤツじゃねえんだが……
english: [Tarta's Father] They say my son's the hero. Guess this's that thing about even normal parents having genius kids...... But, no matter how favorably you look at it, this's like a huge exaggeration, ain't it though......

japanese: ま、勇者の親父ってのも悪くねえやね。 ヘッヘ。[END]
english: Well, being the hero's old man ain't bad either. Heh, heh.

japanese: [Old Man] わしの孫が勇者らしいぞい！ わしの血じゃな！ ファファファ……！！！！[END]
english: [Old Man] I hear my grandson's the hero! That's my blood! Fwa, ha, ha......!!!!

japanese: [Little Girl] 私タータのおよめさんにして もらうの！[END]
english: [Little Girl] I'm gonna have Tarta make me his bride!

japanese: [Woman] ハイパーほしにくがあれば すんごい料理がつくれるんだけどねえ……。[END]
english: [Woman] If I had Hyper Dried Meat, I could make some incredible cooking, but......

japanese: [Young Man] ベッドのそばにあるのは この家に代々伝わる、開かずの宝ばこです。 中には何が入っているのやら？ もし開けられたらあなたにあげますよ。[END]
english: [Young Man] Next to the bed is an unopened treasure chest that's been passed down in this family for generations. I wonder what's inside? I'll give it to you if by some chance you can open it.

japanese: 村長「デナドロ山の東にある山は魔岩窟と 呼ばれておる。 あそこに行くと、せすじがゾッと するんじゃ。[END]
english: Chief: The mountain to the east of the Denadoro Mountains is called the Demon Cavern. It sends shivers down my back when I go there.

japanese: [Young Woman] タータが勇者のあかしであるバッジを 持っていたんです。
english: [Young Woman] Tarta had the badge that's proof of the hero.

japanese: はじめは、にせ物かと思いましたが あれはまさしく勇者のあかし。 タータは本当に勇者様だったんです！
english: At first, I thought it might have been a fake, but that's definitely the hero's proof. Tarta was really the Hero!

japanese: 今ごろはきっと伝説の剣をさがして 北のデナドロ山ではないでしょうか。[END]
english: He's sure to be in the Denadoro Mountains to the north now, searching for the legendary sword.

japanese: [Tarta] 「うっひゃ～ッ！[END]
english: [Tarta] 'Uhhyaaa!

japanese: 少年「こ、ここは、とんでもないトコだ！ あ、あんちゃん達も、アブナイぜ とっとと、ズラかんねーと。[END]
english: Boy: Th, this is a horrible place! Y, you guys too, it's dangerous. Gotta run away quick.

japanese: [FreeLancer] 「うるさい！　じゃましないでくれ！[END]
english: [FreeLancer] Shaddup! Don't disturb me!

japanese: [Kilwala] 「山はいいよねえ。[END]
english: [Kiwala] Mountains are nice, aren't they.

japanese: [Kilwala] 「いいんだな、これが。[END]
english: [Kiwala] This's nice.

japanese: [Kilwala] 「山はいいよねえ。[END]
english: [Kiwala] Mountains are nice, aren't they.

japanese: [Kilwala] 「君達もしつこいなあ。これやるよ。[END]
english: [Kiwala] You guys sure are stubborn. I'll give you this.

japanese: 子供「ボクは風だぞー。 ぴゅぴゅ～ん！[END]
english: Child: I'm the wind. whooshwhoooosh!

japanese: 子供「ダメッ！！[END]
english: Child: Don't!!

japanese: 子供「お兄ちゃん達も、取りに来たの？ グランドリオン。 はい いいえ[END]
english: Child: Did you guys come to take it too? The Grandleon. Yes No

japanese: 子供「なーんだ、ちがうの。 なら、早く山を下りた方がいいよ。[END]
english: Child: What, that's not it? Then you should leave the mountain quickly.

japanese: 子供「うーん、そーか。 ちょっと待っててね……。[END]
english: Child: Huhn, I see. Hold on a sec......

japanese: 子供「おーい、グラン兄ちゃ～ん！[END]
english: Child: Heeey, Gran nii-chaaan!

japanese: グラン「どーした、リオン？[END]
english: Gran: What's wrong, Leon?

japanese: グラン「やれやれ、またか……。[END]
english: Gran: Oh, come on, not again......?

japanese: グラン「グランドリオンを手に入れて 勇者としての名声がほしいんだろ？ くだらないよ……。[END]
english: Gran: You want to get the Grandleon and make a name for yourself as the hero, right? Ridiculous......

japanese: リオン「人間って、バッカだねー。 手にした力をどう使うかが 大事なのに……。[END]
english: Leon: Humans are idiots. It's how you use the power you've gained that's important, and yet......

japanese: グラン「そんな当り前の事も わからないから人間やってんだよ。[END]
english: Gran: It's because they don't even understand something so obvious that they're human.

japanese: リオン「どーする、兄ちゃん？[END]
english: Leon: What'll we do, nii-chan?

japanese: グラン「決まってるだろ、ためすのさ。 少しばかり、あそんでやろう！[END]
english: Gran: It's obvious, we test them. For just a little, we're gonna play with them.

japanese: リオン「うん！　行くぞー！！ ぴゅぴゅ～ん！[END]
english: Leon: Yeah! Here we gooo!! whooshwhoooosh!

japanese: リオン「兄ちゃん、コイツら、やるね。[END]
english: Leon: Nii-chan, these guys are good.

japanese: グラン「ここまで手こずったのは サイラス以来だ。[END]
english: Gran: We haven't had this much trouble dealing with anyone since Cyrus.

japanese: グラン「決まってるだろ。 本気でいくんだよ！[END]
english: Gran: It's obvious, right? We're going at it seriously!

japanese: リオン「よーし！　今度は…… グラン「あそびじゃないぞ！[END]
english: Leon: All right! This time...... Gran: We're not playing!

japanese: [System] ゆうきのグランと……[END]
english: [System] Brave Gran and......

japanese: ちえのリオン！！[END]
english: Wise Leon!!

japanese: コンフュ～ジョ～ン！！[END]
english: Soul fuuusiooon!!

japanese: リオン「やられちゃったね、兄ちゃん。[END]
english: Leon: We got beat, nii-chan.

japanese: グラン「なかなか楽しかったな。[END]
english: Gran: That was funner than I expected.

japanese: リオン「この人達なら、ボクらを なおしてくれるかな？
english: Leon: I wonder, will these people fix us?

japanese: ちゃんと持ち主を見つけて くれるかな？[END]
english: Will they do like they should and find us an owner?

japanese: グラン「ああ、だいじょうぶさ。[END]
english: Gran: Yeah, it'll be fine.

japanese: ルッカ「これがグランドリオン……。
english: Lucca: This is the Grandleon......

japanese: でも、この伝説の剣…… もうかなり昔に おれてしまったみたいね……。[END]
english: But, this legendary sword...... It looks like it's already been quite a long time since it broke......

japanese: ロボ「この剣が、伝説の グランドリオン……。
english: Robo: This sword is the legendary Grandleon......

japanese: しかし、これは…… おれてしまってから かなりの時間がたっていマスネ。[END]
english: However, this...... A considerable time HAS passED since it broke.

japanese: [System] おれたグランドリオンを手に入れた！[END]
english: [System] Got the broken Grandleon!

japanese: グラン「ふもとまで風にのせて 一気にはこんでやるよ。[END]
english: Gran: I'll give you a ride on the wind and transport you at once to the mountain base.

japanese: リオン「ガンバってね お兄ちゃん達……。[END]
english: Leon: Do your best, guys......

japanese: [System] 風にのりますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Ride the wind? Yes No

japanese: 主人「勇者様はデナドロ山に 剣をとりに行ったまま、 それっきり何の話も聞かんけど……
english: Owner: The Hero went to the Denadoro Mountains to get a sword, and we haven't heard a thing since.

japanese: その後どこに 行っちまったんだろう……？[END]
english: Where could he have gone after that......?

japanese: [Note] 行商に行っておるので しばらく帰ってこんぞよ。 また今度たずねてきておくれ。 ボッシュ[END]
english: [Note] I'm going peddling, so I won't be back for a while. Do come visit again another time. Bosch

japanese: ルッカ「あれ？　ボッシュはどこ？[END]
english: Lucca: Huh? Where's Bosch?

japanese: ルッカ「てがみかしら？ なになに……[END]
english: Lucca: A letter? Let's see......

japanese: ルッカ「な、なんですってえ！！ あのオヤジ、カンジンな時に いないんだから！　まったく！[END]
english: Lucca: Wh, what!! That old geezer's not here when we need him! Oh, come on!

japanese: マール「あれれ？ ボッシュさんいないね。[END]
english: Marle: Huh? Bosch-san isn't here.

japanese: マール「これ、何かしら？ どれどれ……[END]
english: Marle: What could this be? Let's see......

japanese: マール「何よ　それェ！ カンジンな時にいないんだから～！[END]
english: Marle: What's that supposed to mean! He's not here when we need him!

japanese: [Nu] イヤン、エッチィ！[END]
english: [Nu] Yah, you pervert!

japanese: たてふだ「これより　私有地。 立ち入りきんし。　ゲロゲロ。[END]
english: Notice: Beyond here is private property. No trespassing Gribbit.

japanese: [Frog] 「誰だ！？[END]
english: [Frog] 'Who's there!?

japanese: カエル「よう、クロノか！ どうした、剣でもならいに来たか？[END]
english: Frog: Yo, Crono! What's wrong, have you come to train swords or something?

japanese: カエル「何ッ……！？ 王がたおれられた、だと……？[END]
english: Frog: What......!? The king has fallen, you say......?

japanese: カエル「……。
そうか……。[END]
english: Is that so......
