english: [Young Man] The weapons and armors brought forth from the planet's powers of sky, dark, fire, and water were since sealed in the northern shrine on the Queen's orders. What you can see on the northern continent is its entrance, but nobody can approach it any more.

japanese: [Young Man] 北の宮の扉は、強力な術で 封印されています。 われら光の民ですら あの封印を解くことはできません。[END]
english: [Young Man] The door to the northern shrine is sealed with powerful arts. Even we People of the Light cannot release that seal.

japanese: [Young Woman] あら、ふしぎな旅の方達。 これも夢のつづきなのかしら……。 ようこそジールへ。
english: [Young Woman] Oh my, mysterious travelers. I wonder if this too is a continuation of my dreams......? Welcome to Zeal.

japanese: わが魔法王国ジールをみちびくのは 女王ジール様……。 この世にふたりといない 美しく、いだいなお方ですよ。[END]
english: It is Queen Zeal who guides our Magic Kingdom of Zeal...... She is great and beautiful as no other in this world.

japanese: [Young Woman] こんにちのジールがあるのは すべて女王様のおかげです。
english: [Young Woman] What we have in today's Zeal is all thanks to the Queen.

japanese: 先王なき後、女王様がこの王国の 魔の力を高め、はってんさせたのです。 スヤスヤ……。[END]
english: After the late ruler passed away, the Queen heightened this country's magical power, causing growth. Zzzz......

japanese: [Young Woman] ここは回復のいずみ……。 さあ旅人よ、心の傷をいやし 命のかわきをうるおしてお行きなさい。[END]
english: [Young Woman] This is a recovery spring...... Come, travelers, heal the wounds of your hearts and water the thirst of life.

japanese: [Young Man] 女王様の宮殿は、このジールの中心。 西の大陸のいただきから つねに世界を見守っていてくださる。
english: [Young Man] The Queen's palace is in the heart of Zeal. She constantly watches over the world from the summit of the western continent.

japanese: だから私達もこうして安心して 夢の中にやすらうことが出来るのだよ。 ムニャムニャ……。[END]
english: That's why we can relax in dreams with peace of mind like this. mumble mumble......

japanese: [Young Man] 北の宮の中は一体 どうなっているのかなあ……。
english: [Young Man] I wonder what's become of the inside of the northern shrine......?

japanese: あの封印を解くカギも 宮殿にはあるのだろうけれど…… 女王様のご命令じゃなあ……。[END]
english: The key to release that seal is probably in the palace too, though...... Queen's orders......

japanese: [Poyozo Doll] 運命というものは存在すると思いますか？ この世のすべては、あらかじめ 決められているのだと……。[END]
english: [Poyozo Doll] Do you think that 'fate' exists? That everything of this world is already decided in advance......

japanese: どうでしょう？ まさにそう思う。 ぜったい、そんな事はない。 お前なんかの知った事じゃない。[END]
english: How do you think it is? I think it's surely so. There's absolutely no such thing. It's not something the likes of you would know.

japanese: そうですか、やはりあなたも……。
english: I see, so you too......

japanese: しょせん人の子の力では 運命にさからう事など 出来ないのでしょうか……。[END]
english: I suppose you can't do such a thing as opposing fate with the power of the children of humans after all, can you......

japanese: そうですよね、やっぱり！ 私達の道は、私達自身が 切り開いて行くのですよね。
english: Yes, just as I thought! We go on cutting open our path for ourselves.

japanese: いいですか？ そのための扉が一つ ここにもあるかも知れませんよ。[END]
english: Listen up. There may be a door for that purpose here as well.

japanese: [Young Woman] 西の大陸のはずれにあるのが 魔術都市カジャール。 さまざまな魔術の研究を 行なっております。
english: [Young Woman] On the edge of the western continent is the Magical City Kajarl. They carry out research on various magic arts.

japanese: 飛行船黒鳥号もカジャールで せいびされるのですよ。 くー、くー。[END]
english: The Airship Blackbird is also maintained at Kajarl. Zzz, zzz.

japanese: [Young man] ぐー、ぐー。 夢の中にこそ、しんじつはある。 私の中にこそ、宇宙はある。[END]
english: [Young Man] Zzz, zzz. It is within dreams that there is reality. It is within me that there is the universe.

japanese: 少年「………。[END]
マール「なーに、この子？ ヘンな感じー。[END]
english: Marle: What's up with this kid? Feels we-eird.

japanese: ルッカ「どうかしたのかな、キミ？ おねーさんに、何かご用かしら？[END]
english: Lucca: Is something the matter, I wonder? Do you want something with onee-san, I wonder?

japanese: ロボ「ワタシ達に、なにかご用で ショウカ？[END]
english: Robo: MIGHT you have some business with US?

japanese: カエル「何だ、ぶあいそなガキだな。[END]
english: Frog: What's this, it's an antisocial kid.

japanese: エイラ「どした　お前？ その動物　ウマイか？[END]
english: Ayla: What wrong, you? That animal tasty?

japanese: 少年「黒い風が泣いてる……。[END]
english: Boy: The black wind is howling......

japanese: 少年「あなた達のうち、誰か一人…… 死ぬよ、もうすぐ……。[END]
english: Boy: One among you...... Will die, very soon......

japanese: マール「な、何それ！？ いきなり何なの？[END]
english: Marle: Wh, what's that!? What's that all of a sudden?

japanese: ルッカ「ちょ、ちょっと！ キミ、どういうこと！？[END]
english: Lucca: H, hey! What do you mean!?

japanese: ロボ「ほ、本当デスカ？ よそうカクリツは……[END]
english: Robo: IS, IS this true? The predicted probability......?

japanese: カエル「おい、こぞう！ 待て……！[END]
english: Frog: Hey, kid! Wait......!

japanese: エイラ「？？？？[END]
english: Ayla: ????

japanese: マール「クロノ…… なんだか気味悪いよ……。[END]
english: Marle: Crono...... I've got kind of a bad feeling......

japanese: ルッカ「たちの悪いジョーダンよ。 ひかがく的だわ。[END]
english: Lucca: A bad-natured joke. It's unscientific.

japanese: ロボ「アノ少年、ナゼ あんな事を……？[END]
english: Robo: THAT boy, WHY, such a thing......?

japanese: カエル「なんだか知らんが 気に入らないガキだぜ……。[END]
english: Frog: I don't know what it is, but I don't like that kid......

japanese: エイラ「あのチビ　ヘン……。 でも　悪いヤツ　ちがう。[END]
english: Ayla: That runt weird...... But not bad guy.

japanese: [Nu] 理の賢者様、もう、いない、ここ。 お前達、力、ためすか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [Nu] Philosopher of Reason not here any more. You guys test power? Yes No

japanese: よし、ならば、ゆくぞ。[END]
english: Okay, then here I go.

japanese: そうか……。[END]
english: I see......

japanese: お前達、強いな。 これ、やる。[END]
english: You guys, strong. I give these.

japanese: お前達、弱いな。 ヌウ……。[END]
english: You guys, weak. Nuu......

japanese: マジックカプセルを手に入れた！
english: Got a Magic Capsule!

japanese: スピードカプセルを手に入れた！
english: Got a Speed Capsule!

japanese: ヌウ……。[END]
『生命のしんぴ』 841かん　26しょう すべての生命は、ヌウにはじまり ヌウに終わる……。
english: [Book] "Mystery of Life" Volume 841, Chapter 26 All life began in Nu and will end in Nu......

japanese: このわしがそー言うのだから まちがいあるまい。 たぶん。[END]
english: Because I say so, this is probably unmistakable. Maybe.

japanese: [Guard] 何だ、お前ら！？[END]
english: [Guard] What do you guys want!?

japanese: [Dalton] 「どうだ、黒鳥号の調子は？[END]
english: [Dalton] How's the Blackbird's condition?

japanese: 兵士「いじょうナシです、ダルトン様！[END]
english: Soldier: Nothing is wrong, Dalton-sama!

japanese: ダルトン「当り前だ、異常があったら 困るだろが！
english: Dalton: Naturally; if there were something wrong, you'd be in trouble!

japanese: それより何だ、お前達は！[END]
english: Never mind that, who are you guys!

japanese: ダルトン「ム？　そのいでたち……
english: Dalton: Hm? Those outfits......

japanese: お前達が予言者の言っていた、計画を 邪魔する者か。[END]
english: Are you the ones the prophet spoke of, who will hinder our plans?

japanese: ダルトン「ここはヤツがどう出るか 様子を見るとするか。[END]
english: Dalton: I guess I'll go with watching to see how he plays his cards.

japanese: ダルトン「ま、ヤツが、そうかんたんに シッポを出してくれるとは思えんがな。 ハッ！[END]
english: Dalton: Well, it doesn't seem like he'd show his true colors so easily. Ha!

japanese: [Guard] この黒鳥号はジール文明のしょうちょうだ。[END]
english: [Guard] This Blackbird is a symbol of Zeal's civilization.

japanese: [Guard] こんなデカいモンが飛ぶとは お前らにはとても信じられんだろ。[END]
english: [Guard] It's completely unbelievable to you guys that such a huge thing flies, right?

japanese: [Young Man] ここは魔術都市カジャール。
english: [Young Man] This is the Magical City Kajarl.

japanese: 王国ジールにさらなる光をもたらす 女王の計画のため様々な研究を行なって おります。[END]
english: We carry out various research for the Queen's plans to bring yet more light to Zeal Kingdom.

japanese: [Young Woman] あら？　あなた方の力は 私達光の民のものとは少し感じが ちがうようですね。
english: [Young Woman] Hm? Your power would seem to have a slightly different feel to it than that of we People of the Light.

japanese: なんでしょう……。 不思議な優しさを感じますわ。[END]
english: What could it be......? I sense a mysterious kindness.

japanese: [Young Man] なんでも原始時代にあったという 虹色の貝がらと、太陽石をあわせれば すばらしい武器やアイテムが つくれたそうだよ。
english: [Young Man] I've heard that if you were to combine Rainbow-Colored Shell said to have existed in the primeval era with the Sun Stone, you could make magnificent weapons and items.

japanese: でも今じゃ、そんな技術をもつのは 命の賢者様だけだし…… それに星の力はすてさるようにって ジール女王のご命令もあるしね……。[END]
english: But now, for one thing, the only one with such skill is the Philosopher of Life...... Besides, there's also Queen Zeal's order to abandon the planet's power......

japanese: ああ、はなはこんなにも美しく みちたりているというのに……。 私は、はなになりたい……。[END]
english: Ahh, flowers are so beautiful and content...... I want to be a flower......

japanese: [Young Man] 南の小大陸に見えるのが かつての太陽神殿だよ。 星の力をひめた太陽石を まつっていたのだけれど……
english: [Young Man] What you can see on the small southern continent is the former Sun Temple. We had enshrined the Sun Stone that stored up the planet's power there, but......

japanese: 新しいエネルギーが 利用されるようになってから 完全に閉ざされてしまったんだ。 北の宮と同じようにね。
english: Ever since the new energy came to be used, it's been completely shut off. Just like the northern shrine.

japanese: もう古い星のエネルギーなんか いらないんだってさ。[END]
english: They say we don't need such a thing as the energy of the old planet any more.

japanese: [Young Woman] めずらしいことに 最近、ジャキ様の姿をよく見かけますね。
english: [Young Woman] We've seen Jyaki-sama unusually often lately.

japanese: なんだか落ち着きなく、あちこち 出あるいているようですが……。[END]
english: It seems that he walks all around, unable to calm down about something.

japanese: [Young Man] 話し相手といったら、姉のサラ様と いつも連れてあるいている あのネコくらいのもの……。
english: [Young Man] After far as who he talks to, that's basically only his older sister Sara-sama and that cat he always takes walking around.

japanese: いったいジャキ様は、何を見て 何を聞いていらっしゃるのか……。[END]
english: Just what is it that Jyaki-sama sees and hears......?

japanese: [Young Man] ジール女王にはニ人のお子がおられる。 サラ様とジャキ様だ。
english: [Young Man] Queen Zeal has two children, Sara-sama and Jyaki-sama.

japanese: サラ様はすばらしいお子であられるぞ。 人なみはずれたスゴイ魔力を 持っておられるのだ。
english: Sara-sama is a magnificent child. She possesses extraordinarily amazing magical powers.

japanese: あれだけの力があれば、人生はもう バラ色であろうなあ……。[END]
english: With that much power, she'll have a glorious life.

japanese: [Young Woman] あら、かわった『気』を まとっておられますね。 やはり術を使われるのですか。
english: [Young Woman] Oh my, you have a peculiar “spirit”. I suppose you can use the arts as well?

japanese: けど私達のものとくらべると ずいぶんと原始的な術のようですわね。 ホッホッ。[END]
english: But they would seem to be quite primitive arts compared with ours. Ho, ho.

japanese: [Young Man] そもそも、われらの力は どこから来たのであろうか？
english: [Young Man] Where might our powers have come from in the first place?

japanese: なぜ術の力を持つ者と持たない者とが 存在するのか……？ うーむ……。[END]
english: Why do both those with the power of arts and those without exist......? Hmm......

japanese: [Young Woman] 地の民と呼ばれる、魔力をもたぬ者達は 雲の下で昔ながらのくらしをしています。
english: [Young Woman] Those called the People of the Earth who lack magical power have long since lived under the clouds.

japanese: しょせん彼らは、私達のような特別な力を 持った人間ではありませんものね。[END]
english: After all, they aren't people with special powers like we are.

japanese: ここ、プラチナ製防具、ある。 でも、じょおう様のゆるし、ないと 売れない……。[END]
english: Here, have platinum armors. But can't sell without Queen's permission......

japanese: お前達、もってるそれ サラ様のペンダント？ はい いいえ[END]
english: That you have, Sara-sama's pendant? Yes No

japanese: ウソつき、きらい。[END]
english: Hate liars.

japanese: いらっしゃい。[END]
english: Welcome.

japanese: また来て。[END]
english: Come again.

japanese: [Old Man] 海底神殿は、まだけんせつ中です。 計画に少しおくれが出ておるのです。
english: [Old Man] The Ocean Floor Temple is still under construction. It's a bit behind schedule.

japanese: あおい海の底の、永遠なる神殿……。 完成したらさぞ美しく、りっぱなものに なることでしょう！[END]
english: Eternal temple on the floor of the blue sea...... I'm certain it will be beautifully splendid once it's done!

japanese: [Young Man] ごらんなさい。 あの巨大な鳥こそ、理の賢者ガッシュ様が 設計された黒鳥号です。
english: [Young Man] Behold. That huge bird is the Blackbird that the Philosopher of Reason Gasch-sama designed.

japanese: じゆうに空をまうさまは まるで生きているかのようです。 ガッシュ様はやはりすごい。[END]
english: The way it freely dances through the sky looks just like it's alive. Gasch-sama truly is amazing.

japanese: [Young Man] 多くの地の民達が、海の底で 神殿けんせつにあたっております。
english: [Young Man] Many People of the Earth are assigned to the temple construction at the bottom of the ocean.

japanese: あのような者達でも役に立つ時が あるのですね。[END]
english: Even that sort of people have times when they are useful.

japanese: [Young Woman] ちゅうおうの海の底に見えるのが、 女王様のいだいさのあかし、 海底神殿です。
english: [Young Woman] What you can see in the depths of the central ocean is the proof of the Queen's greatness, the Ocean Floor Temple.

japanese: 海底神殿は、あらゆる生命をみちびく 輝きの源となるのです。 おお、いだいなる、ジール女王よ！[END]
english: The Ocean Floor Temple will become the source of the radiance that guides every life. Oh, Great Queen Zeal!

japanese: [Young Woman] このジールには、命・時・理の三賢者様が いらっしゃいます。 術や知恵で彼らにかなう者はおりませぬ。[END]
english: [Young Woman] Here in Zeal are the three Philosopher, of Life, Time, and Reason. There are none who can match them in wisdom and skill.

japanese: [Young Man] 天冥火水の星の力よりもはるかに強力な 新しいエネルギーの利用により ジールはここまでさかえたのです。[END]
english: [Young Man] Zeal has prospered this much through the use of a new energy far more powerful than the planet's powers of sky, dark, fire, and water.

japanese: [Young Man] 宮殿に不思議な予言者があらわれたという うわさを聞きましたよ。
english: [Young Man] I've heard rumors that a mysterious prophet appeared at the palace.

japanese: くわしいことは知りませんが すごい魔力の持ち主だそうです。[END]
english: I don't know the details, but I've heard he's the owner of an amazing magical power.

japanese: [Old Man] わしは術の力を高める 魔法のカプセルを研究しとるのじゃ。
english: [Old Man] I'm researching a magical capsule to boost the power of arts.

japanese: しかし最近よく大切なカプセルが 消え失せてしまうんじゃが……。
english: But my precious capsules have been vanishing lately......

japanese: きっとイタズラ好きのヌウめが かくしてまわっとるにちがいない。 まったく、こまったもんじゃわい。[END]
english: I've no doubt that that mischievous Nu's hiding them on me. Dagnabbit, it's annoying.

japanese: [Old Man] おっと、そのカプセルは 未完成のサンプルじゃぞ。
english: [Old Man] Hold it, that capsule's an unfinished sample.

japanese: ザンネンじゃったな、ホッホッ！[END]
english: Too bad, ho ho!

japanese: [Young Man] うわさですが、サラ様の魔力は 母親である女王の力さえ はるかにしのぐという事です。
english: [Young Man] This is just a rumor, but they say Sara-sama's magical powers far surpass even the powers of her mother the Queen.

japanese: それにひきかえ弟のジャキ様は……。 王家の血すじであるというのに まったく魔力を持たないらしいのです。[END]
english: Her brother Jyaki-sama, on the other hand...... Even though he is of the royal lineage, it seems he has absolutely no magical powers.

japanese: [Young Woman] むかし賢者様から教わったのですが 太陽石には、太陽の無限の力を たくわえることができたのだそうです。
english: [Young Woman] I one learned from the Philosophers that they were able to store up the infinite power of the sun in a Sun Stone.

japanese: ただし、力をつかいはたすと 輝きを失ってしまって、 暗黒石に変わったとか……。[END]
english: However, when it used up its power, it lost its radiance and became a Darkness Stone, or something like that......

japanese: [Old Man] 知っておるかね、旅の人？
english: [Old Man] Did you know, travelers?

japanese: 暗黒石を陽のあたる場所にねかせておけば 失われた輝きをとりもどすことが できるのじゃ。
english: If you lay a Darkness Stone in a place where the sun hits, it can regain its lost radiance.

japanese: ただし、そのためには 気の遠くなるような長い時間が必要でな。 あの輝きを目にすることは もう二度とあるまい……。[END]
english: However, you need a mind-bogglingly long period of time for that to happen. I doubt I'll ever again lay eyes on that radiance......

japanese: [Nu] こちょこちょ……。[END]
english: [Nu] Koochie, koochie......

japanese: うくっ……[END]
english: Ukuu......

japanese: はうっ……！[END]
うきゃうきゃ……！[END]
english: Ukya, ukya......!

japanese: [Nu] 水は風を呼んで…… 風は火をおどらせる……[END]
english: [Nu] Water calls wind...... Wind makes fire dance......

japanese: [System] えたいの知れないものを 見つけてしまった！！[END]
english: [System] Found something of an unknown nature!!

japanese: と思ったら中から『黒の石』が出てきた！[END]
english: Just then, a "Black Rock" came out from inside!

japanese: [Book] 何千万年もの昔、人の祖先がふと手にした 不思議な赤い石のかけら……。 そこからすべては始まったのだ。 人の知を超えた力は夢をはぐくみ 愛とにくしみを生んだ……。
english: [Book] Tens of millions of years ago, the ancestors of humans happened to take a fragment of a mysterious red rock in hand...... Everything started from there. A power that surpassed human knowledge gave rise to dreams and gave birth to love and hate......

japanese: それがどのような終わりを見るか…… 時だけがそのこたえを知っていよう。[END]
english: What manner of ending will that see......? Perhaps only time knows the answer.

japanese: [Young Man] ここは女王様の宮殿。 わがジール王国の中心……
english: [Young Man] This is the Queen's palace. The heart of our Zeal Kingdom......

japanese: ということは、すなわち まさに宇宙の中心という事です。[END]
english: Which means, in other words, it's surely the heart of the universe.

japanese: [Old Man] おおいなるエネルギーの源は 海底ふかくで眠っておる。
english: [Old Man] The source of our great energy sleeps deep in the ocean floor.

japanese: そのたしかな位置が判明したため 今回の海底神殿けんせつの計画が 実行にうつされたのじゃよ。[END]
english: As its exact position has been confirmed, the current Ocean Floor Temple construction project has been put into practice.

japanese: [Young Man] 海底神殿への入り口は 女王の間にあるらしいよ。 でも、まだ神殿は未完成なんだけどね。[END]
english: [Young Man] I've heard that the entrance to the Ocean Floor Temple is in the Queen's hall. The temple is incomplete as yet, though.

japanese: [Old Man] あの旅の予言者は本物じゃぞ。 なんでもかんでもピタリとあてちまう。
english: [Old Man] That traveling prophet is the real thing. He's dead-on with anything and everything.

japanese: まるで、これから起こる事を すでに知っているかのようじゃ……。 気味が悪いわい。[END]
english: It's just like he already knows what's going to happen after this...... It's uncanny.

japanese: [Young Woman] まあ、ずいぶんかわったかっこうを なさっているのですね。 よほど遠くからいらしたのですか？
english: [Young Woman] Oh my, you look extremely unusual. Have you come from quite far away?

japanese: 回復のいずみで旅のつかれを いやして行かれるとよいでしょう。[END]
english: You should use the spring of recovery to heal the fatigue of travel.

japanese: [Young Woman] 緑はお好きですか、旅の方達？ 好き キライ[END]
english: [Young Woman] Do you like green things, traveling persons? Like Dislike

japanese: そう……。 それでは女王様と同じね……。[END]
english: I see...... Then you're the same as the Queen......

japanese: まあ！　私も大好きなのです！
english: Well! I also like them very much!

japanese: でも命の賢者様からいただいた このわかぎを、女王様は もやしてしまえと……。
english: But the Queen said to burn up this sapling that I received from the Philosopher of Life......

japanese: 緑を守る力を持った 不思議なわかぎだと賢者様は おっしゃっていたのに……。[END]
english: And yet the Philosopher said that it is a mysterious sapling with the power to protect greenery......

japanese: ああ、どうしたらいいのでしょう？ もやしてしまえ どこかにこっそりうえる[END]
english: Ahh, what should I do? Burn it Plant it somewhere secretly

japanese: そうですか……。 女王様のご命令ですもの しかたありませんよね……。[END]
english: I see...... The Queen DID order it, so it can't be helped......

japanese: そうですよね！ いくら女王様のご命令でも 賢者様からいただいたものを もやしてしまうなど……。
english: You're right! Even if on the Queen's orders, such a thing as burning up what I received from the Philosopher......

japanese: わかりました。 このわかぎは、どこかに大切に うえておきましょう。
english: Understood. I will plant this sapling with care somewhere.

japanese: いつか緑を守る人のために 役に立ってくれるかもしれませんもの。[END]
english: It may someday be of use for someone who protects greenery.

japanese: もし生まれかわることが出来るなら 大地の上で緑と共にくらしたい……。[END]
english: If I can be reborn, I want to live on the earth along with greenery......

japanese: [Old Man] 魔神器や海底神殿について知りたいならば 三賢者様か女王様にお聞きするのが 一番ですな。
english: [Old Man] If you want to know about the Demonic Vessel or Ocean Floor Palace, the Three Philosophers or the Queen are the best ones to ask.

japanese: じゃが、ここだけの話、今の女王様では どんなこたえが返ってくることか……。[END]
english: But, just between us, there's no telling how the Queen would respond as she is now......

japanese: [Old Man] あの男は少し前にふらりと宮殿にあらわれ たしかな予言で女王の信をえたのだ。 ヤツがどこから来たのか誰も知らない。 我ら光の民ではなし、むろん地の民である わけもない……。　う～む……。[END]
english: [Old Man] That man wandered into the palace a little while ago and earned the Queen's trust with his reliable predictions. Nobody knows where that guy came from. He's not one of us People of the Light, and of course there's no way he's of the People of the Earth...... Hmmm......

japanese: [Young Man] 知ってるかい、旅の人。 エンハーサやカジャールには 理の賢者ガッシュ様のヒミツの部屋が あるそうだよ。[END]
english: [Young Man] Did you know of this, travelers? In Enhasa and Kajal, the Philosopher of Reason Gasch-sama has secret rooms, they say.

japanese: [Young Woman] 女王の二人のお子様 サラ様とジャキ様は、本当に 仲の良い姉弟ですわ。 これで、もう少しジャキ様が サラ様以外の人にも 心を開いてくだされば……。[END]
english: [Young Woman] The Queen's children, Sara-sama and Jyaki-sama, truly have a good relationship as siblings. If only Jyaki-sama would open his heart a little more to others apart from Sara-sama......

japanese: [Young Woman] あら、あなたの持っている そのペンダント……。
english: [Young Woman] Oh, that pendant you're carrying.....

japanese: サラ様の物とよく似ていますわね。
english: It looks much like Sara-sama's.

japanese: でもサラ様のペンダントのような しんぴ的な輝きはありませんのね。[END]
english: But it doesn't have a mystic radiance like Sara-sama's pendant does.

japanese: [Leon] グラン兄ちゃん ボク、風になりたいな……。[END]
english: [Leon] Gran nii-chan, I wanna become the wind......

japanese: [Gran] ああ、なれるさ。 いつか、きっと、な……。[END]
english: [Gran] Yeah, you'll be able to. Some day, for sure......

japanese: [Leon] ドリーン姉ちゃん、またエンハーサに あそび行っちゃったね。[END]
english: [Leon] Doreen nee-chan went to play in Enharsa again.

japanese: [Gran] ああ……。 姉ちゃんは夢が好きだからな。[END]
english: [Gran] Yeah...... It's cause nee-chan likes dreams.

japanese: [Leon] ボクは風の方がスキだな。 ぴゅぴゅ～ん！[END]
english: [Leon] I like the wind better. whooshwhoooosh!

japanese: [Gran] どーしてるかな 命の賢者のじーさん……。
english: [Gran] Wonder what he's doing, old man Philosopher of Life......

japanese: やってらんないよな。 まったく人間てのは……。[END]
english: Hasn't been around lately...... Sheesh, humans......

japanese: [Nu] ちょっと、せなか…… してくれる、こちょこちょ？ こちょこちょ　しちゃう イヤッ！[END]
english: [Nu] My back...... Scratch for a bit? Scratch No way!

japanese: ケチンボ……。[END]
english: Stingy......

japanese: わーい、やったー。[END]
english: Yaay, yippie.

japanese: うん…… そこそこ……。
english: Yeah...... There, there......

japanese: はうっ……！[END]
english: haooh......!

japanese: ふーっ…… ありがと……。[END]
english: Phew...... Thanks......

japanese: ヌウの、こちょこちょポイントを 見きった！！[END]
english: Discovered the Nu's scratch point!

japanese: [Young Woman] 夢より生まれ、夢に帰って行く……。 そんな生命もありますわ。
english: [Young Woman] Born of dreams, returning to dreams...... Beings such as that exist as well.

japanese: 時には、人のいのりや望みが ラヴォス様の力をかりて 実体化してしまうことがあるのです。[END]
english: At times, human prayers and desires borrow the power of Lavos-sama and materialize.

japanese: [Old Man] 黒鳥号や海底神殿の設計をなされた 理の賢者ガッシュ様も 行方がわからないのだ。
english: [Old Man] The whereabouts of the Philosopher of Reason Gasch-sama, who designed the Blackbird and Ocean Floor Palace, are also unknown.

japanese: 王国ジールをみちびいてきた賢者様達が 三人そろって姿をかくしてしまわれるとは ……。[END]
english: To think that the Philosophers who guided Zeal Kingdom would all three together disappear on us......

japanese: [Young Woman] 時の賢者ハッシュ様は、どこかの小島で ひっそりと時間の研究を続けていると いわれます。
english: [Young Woman] It's said that the Philosopher of Time Hasch-sama is quietly continuing to research time on a small island somewhere.

japanese: 『時の卵』をつくられるとか……。 しかし、もう何年もその姿を見た者は ありません……。[END]
english: He's making a "Time Egg", or something...... However, it has been many years now since anyone has seen him......

japanese: [Nu] ここ、まじんきの間へつづく……。[END]
english: [Nu] This leads to the Demon Machine's hall......

japanese: [Young Woman] あの予言者の気は、にくしみと悲しみに みちております……。
english: [Young Woman] That prophet's spirit is filled with hatred and sorrow......

japanese: あのままでは、いずれ自らを ほろぼしてしまうことでしょう。 自分の愛するものさえ みちづれにして……。[END]
english: At the rate he's going, he'll destroy himself eventually. Taking even what he loves along with him......

japanese: [Old Man] この先は『魔神器』の間じゃ。 う～む、すごい気のみなぎりじゃな。 さすがラヴォス・エネルギー！[END]
english: [Old Man] Beyond here is the hall of the “Demonic Vessel”. Hmm, it's brimming with incredible spirit. That's Lavos Energy for you!

japanese: [Young Woman] あなた方も魔神器を 見にいらしたのですか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [Young Woman] Have you also come to see the Demonic Vessel? Yes No

japanese: やっぱり！ いだいなるラヴォス様の パワーのうねり、ビンビン来ますよね。 ああ、うるうる……。[END]
english: I knew it! Waves of the great Lavos-sama's power are vibrating out. Aah, my eyes are clouding......

japanese: あら……。　ダメですよ、感じなきゃー。 ラヴォス様のバイブレーション。 ファイナル・うるうるですわ！[END]
english: What......? No, you HAVE to feel them. Lavos-sama's vibrations The ultimate eye-clouder!

japanese: [Young Man] これこそが、ジールの力の源。 ラヴォス様の無限エネルギーを引き出し ぞうふくする『魔神器』です。[END]
english: [Young Man] THIS is the source of Zeal's power. The "Demonic Vessel" draws out and amplifies Lavos-sama's infinite energy.

japanese: [Young Woman] 魔神器をコントロールするには 引き出すエネルギーを制御できるだけの 強い魔力が必要となります。
english: [Young Woman] To control the Demonic Vessel, you need strong enough magical power to be able to regulate the energy it draws out.

japanese: 三賢者様以外で、魔神器をあつかえるのは 今ではもうサラ様だけです。[END]
english: Now, the only one outside of the Three Philosophers who can handle the Demonic Vessel is Sara-sama.

japanese: [Young Man] 三賢者様が、王家に伝わる赤き石より この魔神器を生みだされたのです。
english: [Young Man] The Three Philosophers brought forth this Demonic Vessel from the red stone passed down in the royal family.

japanese: 計画のリーダーの命の賢者様は ラヴォス様についていろいろと 研究されておりました。 それで……。[END]
english: The Philosopher of Life, who was the leader of the project, researched various things concerning Lavos-sama. And then......

japanese: [Old Man] 三賢者の一人、命の賢者様は 女王の計画に反対なさってから 姿が見られなくなってしまった……。 まさかとは思うが……。[END]
english: [Old Man] Ever since one of the Philosophers, the Philosopher of Life, opposed the queen's plans, he hasn't been seen...... You don't suppose that......

japanese: [Young Man] 魔神器が完成してから 女王は別人の様に冷たくなられてしまった。
english: [Young Man] Since the Demonic Vessel was completed, the queen has become cold, like a different person.

japanese: ここだけの話ですが、女王にさからえば 地の民だけでなく光の民も 情けようしゃなく 消されてしまうといううわさが……。[END]
english: Just between you and me, rumor has it that not just the People of the Earth, but also the People of the Light are mercilessly eliminated if they oppose the Queen......

japanese: [Old Man] 魔神器を海底神殿にうつせば ラヴォス様から、より強大なエネルギーを えることができる。
english: [Old Man] If we move the Demonic Vessel to the Ocean Floor Palace, we can get more powerful energy from Lavos-sama.

japanese: われら光の民の最後の望み 不老不死も夢ではない！
english: The final desire of we People of the Light, never aging nor dying, is no dream!

japanese: おお、いだいなる女王よ！ わがジール王国は永遠なのだ！！[END]
english: Oh, great Queen! Our Zeal Kingdom is eternal!!

japanese: [Young Man] 海底神殿が完成すれば わがジール王国は、永遠の光に つつまれる……。
english: [Young Man] When we complete the Ocean Floor Temple, our Zeal Kingdom will be enveloped in eternal light......

japanese: もうそこには、おそれも悲しみもない。 ただ終わることのない安らぎだけが 待っているのだ。[END]
english: There, no longer will there be either fear or sorrow. Just endless tranquility awaits us.

japanese: [Young Man] 以前は女王の右腕、ダルトン様が 海底神殿の計画をしきっていたのだが 今では旅の予言者が計画を進めている。
english: [Young Man] Previously, the Queen's right-hand man Dalton-sama entirely managed the Ocean Floor Temple project, but now, the traveling prophet is advancing the plans.

japanese: しばらくは、ダルトン様の近くには よらないようにしないとな。 ありゃ、かなりあれてるぞ。[END]
english: You'll have to make sure not to get near Dalton-sama for a while. He's really ticked off.

japanese: [Young Woman] 女王様は、きっと人に言えぬ苦しみ悲しみに お一人でたえてこられたのでは ないでしょうか？
english: [Young Woman] Surely the Queen has borne suffering and sorrow by herself that she can tell no one of, don't you think?

japanese: 大きなものをえる時は、失うものも また大きいもの……。 そのおかげで今日のジールが あるわけですけれど……。[END]
english: When you gain something great, the loss too is great...... The Zeal of today exists thanks to that......

japanese: [Nu] ここ、おやすみの間へつづく……。[END]
english: [Nu] This leads to the bedrooms……

japanese: [Young Man] サラ様のペンダントは 魔神器と同じ赤き石から 作られたのだそうです。
english: [Young Man] They say Sara-sama's pendant was made from the same red stone as the Demonic Vessel.

japanese: サラ様がペンダントを手にして 魔神器にいのると、不思議な輝きを はなつそうですよ。[END]
english: I've heard that when Sara-sama takes the pendant in hand and prays to the Demonic Vessel, it gives off a mysterious radiance.

japanese: [Jyaki] 「姉上！[END]
english: [Jyaki] 'Ane-ue!

japanese: [Sara] 「あら、お帰りなさい。 どうかしたの、ジャキ？[END]
english: [Sara] 'Oh, welcome back. Is something wrong, Jyaki?

japanese: ジャキ「黒い風が……。[END]
english: Jyaki: The black wind......

japanese: サラ「感じるのね、ふきつな気を……？ だいじょうぶよ、心配いらないわ。[END]
english: Sara: You feel it, the ominous spirit......? It's going to be fine, you don't need to worry.

japanese: サラ「さ、これを持っていなさい。[END]
english: Sara: Here, take this.

japanese: ジャキ「これ……？[END]
english: Jyaki: This......?

japanese: サラ「お守りよ。 もしもの時ジャキを守ってくれるよう 私のいのりがこめられているわ。
english: Sara: It's a charm. My prayers are held in it to protect you, just in case.

japanese: いつでも私がそばにいて あげられたらいいのだけれど……。 でも母様の計画が……。[END]
english: I wish that I could always stay by your side...... But mother's plans......

japanese: ジャキ「あんなヤツ、母様じゃない！ 姿形は母様だけど 中身は別のモノだ……。[END]
english: Jyaki: That bitch isn't our mother! The appearance is mother's, but she's something different on the inside......

japanese: それでも私には……。 ゴメンなさい、ジャキ……。[END]
english: And yet, for me...... I'm sorry, Jyaki......

japanese: [Young Woman] しつれいいたします、サラ様。[END]
english: [Young Woman] Please excuse me, Sara-sama.

japanese: 女王様がお呼びです。 しきゅう海底神殿の方におりて いただきたいとのことです。[END]
english: The Queen calls. She would like to have you descend to the Ocean Floor Temple immediately.

japanese: サラ「……わかりました。[END]
english: Sara: ......understood.

japanese: サラ「それじゃ、ジャキ…… 行ってくるわね……。[END]
english: Sara: Well then, Jyaki...... I'll be back later......

japanese: サラ「あら……。 あなた達は……？[END]
english: Sara: Oh...... You are......?

japanese: [Young Woman] サラ様、おいそぎください。 おくれると私が女王様に……。[END]
english: [Young Woman] Sara-sama, please hurry. If we are late, then the Queen will......

japanese: サラ「ええ。　ごめんなさいね。[END]
english: Sara: Yes. I'm sorry.

japanese: ジャキ「………。 むこう、行きなよ。[END]
english: Jyaki: ......... Go away.

japanese: ジャキ「ムダさ。 アルファドは、僕にしかなつかない。[END]
english: Jyaki: It's useless. Alphard won't get attached to anyone but me.

japanese: [Old Man] よいかな、大地は生きておる。 長い時間をかけてゆっくり動き…… 平地は山に……、山は海に……。
english: [Old Man] Listen well, the earth is alive. Over long periods of time, it gradually moves...... Plains to mountains...... mountains to oceans......

japanese: 今は誰も近づけぬ、北の封印宮や 太陽神殿ですら、何千何万もの年をへれば 道がみつかるようになるのかも知れぬな。[END]
english: After many thousands, tens of thousands of years pass, ways may be found to places where none can now approach, such as the sealed northern shrine and the Sun Temple.

japanese: [Nu] ここ、じょおうの間へつづく……。[END]
english: [Nu] This leads to the Queen's hall……

japanese: [Young Woman] この封印の扉は外からは開きません。 サラ様のペンダントのような 術をやぶる強力なカギでもないかぎり。[END]
english: [Young Woman] This sealed door will not open from outside. Not as long as you don't have a powerful key to break arts, such as Sara-sama's pendant.

japanese: [Young Woman] 女王が海底神殿におりられるとかで……。 その間ここは誰ひとり通ることは 出来ませんよ。[END]
english: [Young Woman] The Queen has descended to the Ocean Floor Temple...... During that period, none can enter here.

japanese: あら、そのペンダントは……？ サラ様のものと、そっくりですね。
english: Oh, that pendant......? It looks just like Sara-sama's.

japanese: サラ様が魔神器にいのると、 ペンダントが不思議な輝きを はなつと聞きましたが……。[END]
english: I have heard that whenever Sara-sama prays to the Demonic Vessel, her pendant emits a mysterious radiance......

japanese: マール「あれー？ やっぱり開かないねー。[END]
english: Marle: Huh? It really won't open.

japanese: エイラ「不思議。なんでだ？[END]
english: Ayla: Mysterious. Why?

japanese: ロボ「強力な防御システムの 扉デスネ。[END]
english: Robo: It IS a door with a powerful defense system.

japanese: ルッカ「う～ん……。 やっぱり、そのペンダントに なにかあるんじゃないのかしら……。[END]
english: Lucca: Hmmm...... I wonder if there isn't something about that pendant after all......

japanese: カエル「チキショー、たかが こんな扉ひとつに、手も足も ベロも出ないとは……。[END]
english: Frog: Dammit, to think we can't do a thing against a mere single door like this......

japanese: [Old Man] おや、そのペンダントは……？ サラ様のものと似ていますね。
english: [Old Man] Oh, that pendant......? It looks just like Sara-sama's.

japanese: サラ様が魔神器にいのると、 あのペンダントは不思議な輝きを はなつのですよ。
english: When she prays to the Demonic Vessel, that pendant gives off a mysterious radiance.

japanese: まるで魔神器と、ひみつのことばを かわしているかのようです。[END]
english: It's just as though it's exchanging secret words with the Demonic Vessel.

japanese: [Old Man, Young Man] おお、その輝きは……！？
english: [Old Man, Young Man] Oh, that radiance......!?

japanese: まさしく賢者様達が サラ様のためにと作られたもの！！ どうしてあなた方が……！？[END]
english: That is without a doubt what the Philosophers made for Sara-sama!! How did you......!?

japanese: マール「わーい、開いた、開いた！[END]
english: Marle: Yaaay, it opened, it opened!

japanese: ルッカ「フッフッフッ……。 このていどのシールドなんかじゃ サイエンスの前進はとめられないわよ！[END] ロボ「まさに『賢者の石』デスネ。 マールのペンダントは。[END]
english: Lucca: Hu, hu, hu...... You can't halt the advance of science with the likes of this caliber of shield!  Robo: It IS surely the "Philosopher's Stone". Marle's pendant.

japanese: カエル「さーて、おにが出るか じゃが出るか？[END]
english: Frog: Now then, will an ogre appear, or will a snake appear?

japanese: エイラ「エイラ　行く！ ガンガン　行くぞ　クロ！！[END]
english: Ayla: Ayla go! Go full power, Crono!!

japanese: [Young Woman] まあ、その輝きは……！ サラ様のペンダントですか？[END]
english: [Young Woman] Oh my, that radiance......! Is that Sara-sama's pendant?

japanese: 予言者「！？[END]
english: Prophet: !?

japanese: ダルトン「ほう、お前達か……。[END]
english: Dalton: Oh, you guys......?

japanese: 女王「何者だ、お前達！？ どうやって、ここに入った？[END]
english: Queen: Who are you!? How did you get in here?

japanese: 予言者「女王…… その者どもこそ、私のけいこくした わざわいをなす者達です……。[END]
english: Prophet: Queen...... THESE people are those I warned you of who will bring about catastrophe......

japanese: 女王「何！？　異国の者よ。 お前達も賢者ども同様 このジールにたてつくと言うか！？[END]
english: Queen: What!? Foreigners. Do you too mean to oppose me, Zeal, as the Philosophers did!?

japanese: 女王「たわけた連中めが！ ダルトン、そやつらをとらえろ！[END]
english: Queen: Foolish lot! Dalton, seize them!

japanese: ダルトン「はッ！ こころえまして……。[END]
english: Dalton: Yes, ma'am! Certainly......

japanese: ダルトン「ゴーレム！[END]
english: Dalton: Golem!

japanese: ダルトン「俺様のゴーレムを……！ 許せんな、きさまら！[END]
english: Dalton: My golem......! I can't forgive you, you bastards!

japanese: 女王「フフフ……。 安心しろ、すぐには殺さぬわ……。
english: Queen: Hu, hu, hu...... Relax, I won't kill you right away......

japanese: あらゆる悲しみ、苦しみ…… そしてきょうふを味わわせてやる。 わらわの計画にさからった事を たっぷりとこうかいするがいい。
english: I'll let you taste every sorrow, suffering...... and terror. May you thoroughly regret opposing my plans.

japanese: フフフ……。 アーッハッハッ……！[END]

japanese: ボッシュ「間に合わなかったか！[END]

english: It may be ideal for standing against Lavos.

japanese: [System] クロノをつれて行きますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Take Crono along? Yes No

japanese: スペッキオ「お！　ツンツン頭！ 元気か、何してた？[END]
english: Spekkio: Oh! Pointy-head! How are ya, what's up?

japanese: マール「ペンダントが……[END]
english: Marle: The pendant......

japanese: ルッカ「ペンダントが光ってるの？[END]
english: Lucca: The pendant's glowing?

japanese: ロボ「コ、コノかがやきハ？[END]
english: Robo: TH, THIS radiance?

japanese: カエル「ペンダントから光が！？[END]
english: Frog: Light from the pendant!?

japanese: エイラ「コレ　光ってる！[END]
english: Ayla: This, it shining!

japanese: 魔王「……ペンダント？[END]
english: Magus: ......the pendant?

japanese: [Nu] 封印ハ　解除サレタ。 理ノ賢者ガ　作リシ　宝物ヲ　アタエヨウ。[END]
english: [Nu] THE seal WAS releasED. I SHALL PRESENT YOU THE treasure THE Philosopher OF Reason mADE.

japanese: 右ニハ　力ヲ　生ミ出ス　武器ガ……[END]
english: ON THE right, A weapon THAT brinGS forth power......

japanese: 左ニハ　生命ヲ　守ル　防具ガ　アル。[END]
english: ON THE left, armor THAT protecTS life.

japanese: ドチラガ　オノレニ　必要ナノカ ヨク　考エテ　持ッテ行クガ　ヨイ。[END]
english: YOU SHOULD CAREFULLY consiDER WHICH YOU need BEFORE takING IT.

japanese: 13000年ノ　時ハ　長カッタ…… ガッシュ様　今　オソバニ……[END]
english: 13,000 years OF time WAS long...... Gasch-sama, now TO YOUR SIDE......

japanese: [Woman] うれしいね。 ついに平和がやって来たんだね。[END]
english: [Woman] How pleasant. Peace has finally come.

japanese: [Young Man] 長き戦いもついに終わりが来ました。[END]
english: [Young Man] An end has finally come to the long war.

japanese: [Banta] 勇者様のおかげで平和がおとずれて リーネの鐘も王様にけんじょう出来たし いうことねえや。 ガルディアバンザイ！！ もう飮まずにはいられねえ！[END]
english: [Banta] Thanks to the Hero, peace has come, and I was able to present Leene's Bell to the King too. Long live Guardia! I've gotta get me a drink now!

japanese: [Young Woman] 平和の足音が聞こえてきましたね。[END]
english: [Young Woman] I can hear the footsteps of peace coming.

japanese: [Nun] この世界に、やまないあめはありません。 どんな夜にも、いつかは終りが くるのです……。
english: [Nun] There is no rain in this world that does not end. No matter the night, its end will come in time......

japanese: 本当に大切なのは、 自分の愛するものを信じて、 最後まであきらめないこと……。
english: That which is truly important is to believe in what you love, and to never give up until the end......

japanese: あなたのことを大切におもう人が、 きっと世界のどこかで、 見守っていてくれますよ。[END]
english: Those people who consider you precious are surely watching over you somewhere in the world.

japanese: [Soldier] おお、待っていたぞ！ さ、王のもとへ！[END]
english: [Soldier] Hey, we've been waiting! Now, go to the King!

japanese: [Soldier] まったくラッキーだぜ……
english: [Soldier] You're seriously lucky......

japanese: 魔王を倒しちまうなんてな。[END]
english: Beating Magus and all.

japanese: [Soldier] ケガを負った兵も、みな回復しました。[END]
english: [Soldier] The wounded soldiers have all recovered too.

japanese: [Maid] ホラホラ、みんなもう直ってんだよ！[END]
english: [Maid] Look, look, everyone's healed now!

japanese: [Injured Knight] や……
english: [Injured Knight] Be......

japanese: やさしくして……[END]
english: Be gentle......

japanese: [Soldier] 騎土団長と料理長、やっと みとめあったんですよ。 まだ、テレてるみたいだけど。[END]
english: [Soldier] The Knight Captain and Head Cook have finally accepted each other. It looks like they're still embarrassed though.

japanese: [Maid] ゴメンね、たてこんでて それどころじゃないの。[END]
english: [Maid] I'm sorry, but it's crowded and this isn't the time for this.

japanese: [Maid] うちの人が考えたスゴい料理を けんきゅう中なんだよ。[END]
english: [Maid] My husband's in the middle of researching some amazing cooking he thought of.

japanese: [Maid] あまりにスゴいんで、いつ完成するか……[END]
english: [Maid] It's too amazing, when's he gonna finish......?

japanese: [Maid] スゴい料理には、やっぱスゴい名前を つけなきゃね。[END]
english: [Maid] Gotta give amazing cooking an amazing name after all.

japanese: [Knight Captain] 魔王軍にうち勝ったのは 我々の団結と、そして何よりも クロノ殿達のおかげ。[END]
english: [Knight Captain] Our overcoming of Magus's army was thanks to our unity and, above all else, to Crono-dono and the others.

japanese: カエル、お主もしや……
english: Frog, might you......?

japanese: いや、そうにちがいない。 お主に騎土団長をまかせようと思うのだが。[END]
english: No, there's no mistaking it. I'm thinking about leaving the knight captaincy to you.

japanese: カエル「よしてくれ、ガラじゃねえ。[END]
english: Frog: Forget it, it's not my style.

japanese: [Chef] なーに、おめーらのおかげよ。 俺は料理しただけだ。
english: [Chef] Whaaat, it's thanks to you guys. I just cooked.

japanese: 魔王軍への勝利をいわう料理を 考えてんだ。　ゴージャスなヤツをな！[END]
english: I'm thinking about some cooking to celebrate the victory over Magus's army. Something gorgeous!

japanese: [Knight] ゼナンの橋がやぶられていたら この城もかいめつしたでしょう。[END]
english: [Knight] If Zenan Bridge had been beaten, this castle would probably have been wiped out too.

japanese: [Knight] 魔王城から出てこないと聞いて てっきり……[END]
english: [Knight] When I heard you hadn't come out of Magus Castle I thought for sure......

japanese: [Chancellor] クロノどのには、まごの代まで かんしゃいたしまするぞ！[END]
english: [Chancellor] Crono-dono, my thanks extend unto the time of my grandchildren.

japanese: あなた達には、何とおれいを言って いいか……
english: [Queen Leene] How should I express my thanks to you all......?

japanese: カエル！ カエルはどうしたのです？[END]
english: Frog! What happened to Frog?

japanese: [Queen Leene] カエル！
english: [Queen Leene] Frog!

japanese: やはり、あなたもクロノ達と いっしょでしたか。
english: So you really were together with Crono and the others.

japanese: よくやってくれました。 あなたは何はばかる事なく、この城に いていいのですよ。[END]
english: You have done well. You need not hesitate to stay in this castle.

japanese: カエル「……
そのお言葉だけでじゅうぶんで ございます……。[END]
english: Your words are enough in themselves......

japanese: [King Guardia] おお、生きておったか！
english: [King Guardia] Oh, so you're alive!

japanese: そなたらのおかげで、我々は救われた。 大きなぎせいもあったが……
english: We were saved thanks to you. Though a great many were sacrificed......

japanese: これからは騎土団長、料理長ともに この城を、いやガルディア王国を もりたててゆかねばな。
english: Now, we, along with the Knight Captain and Head Cook, must restore this castle, no, restore Guardia Kingdom.

japanese: 何かあったら力になるぞ。[END]
english: We will help you if something comes up.

japanese: [Queen Leene] カエル、ごくろうであった。 お前のはたらきこそ、騎土の名に ふさわしい。[END]
english: [Queen Leene] Frog, thank you for your efforts. Your achievements are exactly what are suited to the name of Knight.

japanese: カエル「私の様な者にもったいない お言葉……[END]
english: Frog: Your words are more than one such as I deserves......

japanese: [System] 不思議な力で封印されている……。[END]
english: [System] It's sealed with a mysterious power.

japanese: ペンダントに反応して、中の物が 光りだした。　なかみを取り出しますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Something inside reacted to the pendant and began glowing. Remove the contents? Yes No

japanese: [Young Man] うおおおおおおおお！！！！
english: [Young Man] Whoooooooa!!!!

japanese: 俺はモウレツに感動してるぞ！！！ 勇者様バンザイ！　ガルディアバンザイ！！[END]
english: I am FURIOUSLY moved!!! Long live the Hero! Long live Guardia!!

japanese: [Soldier] この平和がすえながく続くようにとの 思いをこめて広場を作るって話だ。[END]
english: [Soldier] There's talk of building a square with the hopes that this peace will last a great many years.

japanese: [Soldier] なんでも王妃様の名前をとって 『リーネ広場』にするらしいぜ。[END]
english: [Soldier] I hear they're taking the Queen's name and making it “Leene Square”.

japanese: [Man] ガハハハハハハ！！ めでてえな。 こんなめでてえ日は飮むしかねえべ。[END]
english: [Man] Ga, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha!! Good times. There's no choice but to drink on such a great day.

japanese: [System] ペンダントに反応して中の物が光りだした。 なかみを取り出しますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Something inside reacted to the pendant and began glowing. Remove the contents? Yes No

japanese: [System] ブルーベストがバージョンアップ！ ブループレートを手に入れた！[END]
english: [System] Blue Vest version up! Got a Blue Plate!

japanese: ブルーベストを手に入れた！[END]
english: Got a Blue Vest!

japanese: [Knight] 魔王のいなくなった魔王軍など ガルディア王国軍の敵ではありません。[END]
english: [Knight] The likes of Magus's army with no Magus is no match for the army of Guardia Kingdom.

japanese: [Woman] ようやく平和な時がもどってきそうです。 これもみな勇者様のおかげです。
english: [Woman] It looks like a time of peace is finally returning. This is all thanks to the Hero.

japanese: 勇者様バンザイ！ ガルディア王国バンザイ！[END]
english: Long live the Hero! Long live Guardia Kingdom!

japanese: [Little Boy] わるいまものを、りっぱなゆーしゃさまが やっつけてくれたんだってさ！
english: [Little Boy] They say a great Hero's beaten up the bad guys!

japanese: わーい、わーい！[END]
english: Yay, yay!

japanese: [Young Woman] 今の勇者様って、サイラス様の 知り合いだったのですってね。
english: [Young Woman] They say the Hero now and Cyrus-sama knew each other.

japanese: きっと、ステキな騎土なのでしょうね。 うっとり……。[END]
english: He's got to be a dreamy knight. I'm enthralled......

japanese: カエル「……。
カエル「ニャヘヘ……。[END]
english: Frog: Nya, heh, heh......

japanese: [Woman] なんでも、魔王のヤツめは生きのびて 姿をかくしたそうじゃな……。
english: [Woman] They say that Magus bastard survived and hid himself away......

japanese: あやつを逃しては、ならんのじゃ！ なくなった多くの兵士達のためにも。[END]
english: We can't let him get away! For the sake of the many lost soldiers.

japanese: [Old Woman] ここはサンドリノの村長の家だよ。 やっと平和がもどってくるんだね。[END]
english: [Old Woman] This is the house of Sandrino's village chief. Peace is finally returning.

japanese: [Woman] 魔王の手下の、あの3人ぐみ……。 あいつら、まんまと逃げおおせて どこかの島にかくれてるって話だよ。
english: [Woman] Magus's subordinates, that group of three...... Word is they've managed to run away and are hiding on an island somewhere.

japanese: この世から悪い者がいなくなる日は ないのかねえ……。[END]
english: Will the day never come when the evil ones are gone from this world......?

japanese: [Young Woman] 見よ……
english: [Young Woman] Behold......

japanese: 剣を手にした、かの伝説の勇者を！
english: The legendary Hero, sword in hand!

japanese: ああ、一度でいいから そんな風に言われてみたいなあ 私も！[END]
english: Aaah, just once would be fine, but I wanna try having people talk about me like that too!

japanese: 村長「なにがいだいなる探検家じゃ！ あの、大ウソつきの、トンチキめが！
english: Chief: Legendary explorer, my ass! That damn lying numskull!

japanese: たのんだものは見つからぬし 前金はつかっちまっただと……？ とんだ、くわせもんじゃわい！[END]
english: He's not finding what I asked for and he says he's spent all the advance money......? What a horrible phony!

japanese: [Old Man] さいきんはデナドロ山の風も おだやかで、のどかなもんです。[END]
english: [Old Man] Even the Denadoro Mountain winds have been calm and quiet lately.

japanese: [Nun] ああ、世界はすくわれました！ 少なくとも今回は……。[END]
english: [Nun] Ah, the world have been saved! At least for now......

japanese: 主人「魔王のヤツめ、ザマーみやがれ！
english: Owner: That damn Magus, serves him right!

japanese: これで安心して、飮めるって もんだぜ！ さあ、ガンガン行けい！[END]
english: Now we can drink in peace! Come on, get to it with some gusto!

japanese: [Young Man] 魔王が邪悪なものを生みだすのだけは なんとかぶじふせげたらしいよ。
english: [Young Man] Sounds like they at least safely prevented Magus from bringing forth something evil.

japanese: これでみんなどこへ行こうが 何をしようが安全だよ！
english: Now everyone's safe wherever they go and whatever they do!

japanese: ……ってなワケで 俺はこうして酒でパラダイスに 出かけるのさ。 ウヒック！[END]
english: ......and that's why I'm heading for paradise with alcohol like this. u-hic!

japanese: おかみ「私もささやかな自分の夢を もってるのよ。ウフ……。
english: Hostess: I've got a modest dream of my own, *giggle*......

japanese: あの子のいいお母さんに なれるかしら？[END]
english: I wonder if I could become a good mother for that boy?

japanese: [Mistress] 最近タータのヤツ、けっこーマジメに ガンバってるみたいなのよ。 あいつもちょっとは成長したのかな。[END]
english: [Mistress] It looks like that Tarta's been doing his best to be pretty serious lately. Could even he have grown up a bit?

japanese: [Man] なんでも魔王をたおしたのは マヌケなカエル男なんだってね？
english: [Man] I hear it's some stupid frogman who beat Magus?

japanese: そんなヤツにやれるのなら 私がやればよかったよ！ いや、ほんとに。[END]
english: If someone like that could do it, I should have done it! I mean, seriously.

japanese: ありゃほんと、うす気味…… ゴホッ、ゴホホ……！
english: That was a really cree...... *cough*, *cough*......!

japanese: い、いや、りっぱなカエル様でしたな。 すえは、勇者か大臣か……！[END]
english: N, no, a fine frog-sama. He'll end up a hero or chancellor......!

japanese: フィオナ「魔王軍との戦いで この森に生えていた木々は ほとんどうしなわれてしまいました。
english: Fiona: Most of the trees growing in this forest were lost in the battle with Magus's army.

japanese: 森の緑を守るために 木をうえているのですが すぐにかれてしまうのです……。[END]
english: I'm planting trees to protect the green of the forest, but they soon wither......

japanese: フィオナ「何をうえても すぐにかれてしまう……。 砂漠のどこかに住みついた モンスターのしわざなのです。[END]
english: Fiona: Whatever I plant, it soon withers...... It's the doing of monsters that have settled down somewhere in the desert.

japanese: フィオナ「代々伝わる、不思議な力を持った このなえ木をうえれば、この砂漠を 緑の大地に戻す事も出来るのですが……
english: Fiona: If I were to plant this seedling with mysterious powers that was passed down for generations, it could even restore this desert to green earth, but......

japanese: 砂漠洞窟にモンスターが巣食っていて うえる事が出来ないのです……。[END]
english: I can't plant it with monsters nesting in the desert cave......

japanese: フィオナ「兵士として、魔王軍との 戦いに出ていたおっとのマルコが 帰ってきてくれました……
english: Fiona: My husband Marco, who, as a soldier, went to fight Magus's army, has returned to me......

japanese: 私、わたし……[END]
マルコ「安心して。 これからはずっといっしょだよ。[END]
english: Marco: Relax. From now on, we'll be together for good.

japanese: マルコ「砂漠洞窟に巣食った モンスター達は水に弱いようです。 しかし、僕の力では あのモンスターを倒す事は……。[END]
english: Marco: It seems that the monsters nesting in the desert cave are weak against water. But beating those monsters with my power......

japanese: マール「何の音かしら？[END]
english: Marle: I wonder what that sound is?

japanese: ルッカ「じひびき？[END]
english: Lucca: A tremor?

japanese: ロボ「トッパツ的な地震デショウカ？[END]
english: Robo: IS IT a SPONTANEOUS earthquake?

japanese: カエル「な、なんだ？[END]
english: Frog: Wh, what the?

japanese: エイラ「ゆ、ゆれてるぞ！[END]
english: Ayla: Sh, shaking!

japanese: 魔王「……？[END]
マール「あのモンスターのせいで 木がどんどんかれていくのね！[END]
english: Marle: It's that monster's fault the forest is dying out so fast!

japanese: ルッカ「あのモンスターが 砂漠化の原因みたいね。[END]
english: Lucca: It looks like that monster is the source of the desertization.

japanese: ロボ「砂漠化の進行ハ あのモンスターのせいデスネ。[END]
english: Robo: The progressing desertization IS that monster's fault.

japanese: カエル「あ、あいつが森を砂漠に かえちまったんだな！[END]
english: Frog: Th, that thing turned the forest into desert!

japanese: エイラ「アイツが　森　砂漠にした！[END]
english: Ayla: That made forest desert!

japanese: 魔王「メルフィック…… あいつが砂漠化の原因か……。[END]
english: Magus: Melfikk...... So that's the cause of the desertization...…

japanese: マール「でも、地中を動き回る モンスターなんて…… どこで出会うか、見当もつかないわ！[END]
english: Marle: But something like a monster that moves around underground...… You can't even guess at where you'll run into it!

japanese: ルッカ「しかし、地中を進む モンスターとは、やっかいね。[END]
english: Lucca: But a monster that moves underground is a nuisance.

japanese: ロボ「シカシ、地中を行き来ガ 出来るモンスターとは……[END]
english: Robo: HOWEVER, for the monster to be able to come and go underground......

japanese: カエル「しかし、地中を動き回る ヤツが相手とは…… こいつは、面倒だぜ。[END]
english: Frog: But for a bastard that moves around underground to be the opponent...... This guy's a pain.

japanese: エイラ「地中　動き回る　ホネ！ 見つける　たいへん！[END]
english: Ayla: Bones moving around underground! Big trouble to find!

japanese: 魔王「……、やっかいだな。[END]
english: Magus: ......nuisance.

japanese: マール「これでもう、木がかれる事も ないね。フィオナさん、よろこぶよ。[END]
english: Marle: The trees won't die off any more either now. Fiona-san will be glad.

japanese: ルッカ「これで、砂漠化の原因は とりのぞかれたわ。 フィオナさんに教えてあげるべきね。[END]
english: Lucca: The cause of the desertization has now been removed. We ought to tell Fiona-san.

japanese: ロボ「コレデ、砂漠化の進行ハ オサマルはずデス。 フィオナさんにシラセテあげまショウ。[END]
english: Robo: NOW, the progress of the desertization should SUBSIDE. LET US notify Fiona-san.

japanese: カエル「これでもう、安心だ。 フィオナにしらせてやろうぜ。[END]
english: Frog: Now there's nothing to worry about anymore. Let's let Fiona know.

japanese: エイラ「森　こわした　ホネ　死んだ。 フィオナ　よろこぶ！[END]
english: Ayla: Bones that break trees dead. Fiona glad!

japanese: 魔王「フン……。[END]
english: Magus: Hmph......

japanese: マルコ「あのモンスターをたいじして いただけるとは！ あなた達には、なんとおれいを 言ったらいいのか……。[END]
english: Marco: I can't believe you exterminated those monsters for us! How can we thank you......?

japanese: マルコ「モンスターとの戦いは 終わりました。しかしぼく達には 砂漠となったこの森をもとの姿に もどすという長い戦いが待っています。[END]
english: Marco: The battle with the monsters has ended. However, a long battle awaits us to return this forest to its original form now that it has become a desert.

japanese: フィオナ「モンスターをたいじしてくれて ありがとう。 私も、もう一度がんばってみるわ。
english: Fiona: Thank you for exterminating the monsters for us. I too will try doing all I can once more.

japanese: でも、砂漠をふたたび森にするには 気のとおくなるような時間が 必要なの……。
english: But, to make the desert into forest once more, we need an unimaginably long time...…

japanese: ああ…… 何びゃく年でもはたらき続ける事が 出来るような人がいれば この砂漠を森に戻せるのに……。[END]
english: Aaah...... If only there was someone who could keep working even for hundreds of years, we could turn this desert back to forest...…

japanese: ロボ「……
どうでしょう、ミナサン。 ワタシがココに残って、フィオナさんの オテツダイをするというのは。

english: [Bandor] My name's Bandor. I'm here so we can build a ferry between Medina Village and Truce.

japanese: [Elder] 私がメディーナ村の村長だ。 まあ、ゆっくりしていってくれ。[END]
english: [Elder] I am the chief of Medina Village. Now, go ahead and enjoy your stay.

japanese: [Imp] あ、兄ちゃん達、ひさしぶり～！ 元気だった？[END]
english: [Imp] Hey guys, it's been a while! How've you been?

japanese: [Imp] 今度、トルースとメディーナの間に 定期船が出来るらしいぜ。[END]
english: [Imp] I hear there's going to be a ferry set up between Truce and Medina now.

japanese: [Imp] いらっしゃい！ 何がほしいんだい？[END]
english: [Imp] Welcome? What do you want?

japanese: [Imp] 平和だねェ……[END]
english: [Imp] Peaceful......

japanese: う～む。 メディーナ村の酒は、なかなかいける……[END]
english: [Old Man] Hmmm. Medina Village's sake isn't half bad......

japanese: [Imp] 1ぱく10Gだよ。とまっていくかい？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [Imp] One night's 10G. Stay? Yes No

japanese: ロボ「ココは……
english: Robo: This place......

japanese: ワタシを先頭にしてクダサイ。[END]
english: PLEASE make ME the leader.

japanese: [Mother Brain] 「ワタシの心に勝手に押し入ろうと しているのはドナタ……？
english: [Mother] 'WHO is it that is trying to barge into MY heart without asking......?

japanese: まあ…… お帰りなさいRー66Y……。 イイエ、プロメテス……。 あら？　後ろは生き物？
english: Oh my...... Welcome back, R-66Y...... NO, I mean Promethes...... Oh? Behind you are living beings?

japanese: 生き物が来るなんて ずいぶんひさしぶりね……。 かんげいしますわ、さあ、どうぞ中へ。 クスクス……。[END]
english: It's been quite a long time since any such thing as living beings coming here has happened...... I welcome you, come on inside now. chuckle......

japanese: 「それではアナタ達の性能を見せて いただきマショウ。[END]
english: 'Now, LET'S have you show me YOUR ability.

japanese: 「人間にしては、やりマスネ……。 ワタシの所にたどりつくのを楽しみに していマスヨ……。[END]
english: 'You'RE pretty good, for humans...... I AM looking forward to you making your way to where I am......

japanese: [System] 『ダストシュート』 戻りますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] “Dust Chute” Go back? Yes No

japanese: [System] パワーカプセルを見つけた！[END]
english: [System] Found a Power Capsule!

japanese: [System] マジックカプセルを見つけた！[END]
english: [System] Found a Magic Capsule!

japanese: [System] スピードカプセルを見つけた！[END]
english: [System] Found a Speed Capsule!

japanese: [Mother Brain] 「今から300年昔、ラヴォスの大災害が 起こり、この星は大きく変わりマシタ。
english: [Mother Brain] '300 years ago, the great disaster of Lavos occurred, and this planet greatly changED.

japanese: このまま行けば、やがて人間は 死にたえマス。 ぜつ望という病に心を食べられ……。[END]
english: If things go on like this, humans WILL die out before long. Their hearts are consumed by the disease called hopelessness.......

japanese: 「もう気づいてるかしら？ アナタ達、人間がいなければ この星は平和なのデス。
english: 'I wonder if you've noticed it yet? If YOU humans weren't here, this planet would BE peaceful.

japanese: それでも、あなた達は戦うのデスカ？ 何のために？[END]
english: You WOULD fight even so? To what purpose?

japanese: ロボ「このコンピューターで ジェノサイドームの情報を ひきだせマス。[END]
english: Robo: I CAN pull up information on Genocidome with this computer. From where SHALL I investigate?

japanese: トビラ ベルトコンベア ガードマシン 人形[END]
english: Doors Conveyor Belt Guard Machine Doll

japanese: ロボ「何から調べマショウカ？[END]
english: Robo: From where SHALL I investigate?

japanese: ロックされている扉を開けるには そのヨコについているエネルギーポッドを ジュウデンする必要があります。
english: In order to open the locked doors, it is necessary to electrically charge the energy pods installed next to them.

japanese: 左のエネルギーポッドで電気をおびて 扉のヨコのポッドに入れば ジュウデンされ扉が開きます。[END]
english: If you take on energy at the energy pod to the left and enter the pods next to the doors, they will be electrically charged and the doors will open.

japanese: 人形を守るガードマシンは カクジツに正面に立つものの進路をはばむ。 しかし2体のガードマシンをならべると 機能がテイシするのでチュウイ。
english: The guard machine that protects the doll reliably obstructs the path of those who stand before it. However, when you line up two guard machines, they cease to function, so be careful.

japanese: なお故障したガードマシンは 上の部屋におくこと。[END]
english: Also, you are to place broken-down guard machines in the above room.

japanese: 右をながれるベルトコンベアは 上方にあるスイッチにより ギャクむきになります。[END]
english: The conveyor belt that runs to the right will reverse direction by means of the switch at the upper end.

japanese: このフロア2ケ所にある人形は マザーにえっけんするのに必要です。 勝手にもちださぬように。[END]
english: The dolls found in two places on this floor are required to have an audience with Mother. They are not to be removed without permission.

japanese: ロボ「まだ、調べマスカ？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Robo: SHALL I investigate further? Yes No

japanese: ロボ「ダメです。 プロテクトが何重にもかかっていて…… ココのマザーコンピューターを 破壊スルしか……
english: Robo: It is USELESS. The protection is set up countless layers thick… Outside of desTROYING the Mother Computer of THIS place......

japanese: 手はありマセン……。[END]
english: There is NO way......

japanese: ロボット「おかえりなさい、プロメテス。[END]
english: Robot: Welcome back, Promethes.

japanese: ロボ「……。 アトロポス……？。[END]
english: Robo: ...... Atropos......?

japanese: アトロポス「ええ。 おひさしぶりね、プロメテス。
english: Atropos: Yes. It's been a while, Promethes.

japanese: こっちにいらっしゃい。 もう、エンギはいいのよ。[END]
english: Come over here. Enough ACTING already.

japanese: マール「エンギ？[END]
english: Marle: Acting?

japanese: ルッカ「エンギ？[END]
english: Lucca: Acting?

japanese: カエル「えんぎ？[END]
english: Frog: Acting?

japanese: エイラ「？？[END]
english: Ayla: ??

japanese: 魔王「……。[END]
english: Magus: ......

japanese: アトロポス「フフッ。 プロメテスは他のRシリーズと違って 特別なニンムについてたのよ。
english: Atropos: Hu, hu. Promethes, unlike the other R-series, was on a special MISSION.

japanese: 人間と行動を共にして、ヤツらの 生態をしらべるってね……。[END]
english: To take action together with humans and investigate their mode of life......

japanese: マール「うそ……。[END]
english: Marle: Lies......

japanese: ルッカ「う、うそよ！[END]
english: Lucca: Th, that's a lie!

japanese: カエル「バカな……。[END]
english: Frog: Can't be......

japanese: エイラ「お前　何　言ってる？ エイラ　わからない。[END]
english: Ayla: What you saying? Ayla not understand.

japanese: 魔王「ほう……。[END]
english: Magus: Oh......?

japanese: アトロポス「ウソでは、ないわ。
english: Atropos: It's no LIE.

japanese: ね、プロメテス？[END]
english: Right, Promethes?

japanese: ロボ「……。[END]
アトロポス「さあ、そこをどいて プロメテス。 後ろの人間をハイジョしてから マザーに会いマショウ。[END]
english: Atropos: Come on now, move aside, Promethes. LET US go see Mother after I ELIMINATE the humans behind you.

japanese: エイラ「……。[END]
アトロポス「なにをするのプロメテス。[END]
english: Atropos: What are you doing, Promethes?

japanese: ロボ「この二人を傷つけるのは ゆるしまセン。[END]
english: Robo: I will NOT permit you to harm these two.

japanese: アトロポス「……。 やっぱり故障しているようね。 その二人がバグの元かしら？ すみやかに消去して修理しマショウ。[END]
english: Atropos: ...... It seems that you're malfunctioning after all. I wonder if those two are the source of a bug? LET US speedily eliminate them and repair you.

japanese: ロボ「アトロポス……、あなたは 私の知っているアトロポスでは ありません……。[END]
english: Robo: Atropos...... you are not the Atropos I know......

japanese: アトロポス「そうよ、生まれ変わったの。 マザーのおかげで人間どもをより ハイジョできるように！！ そこをどきなさい、プロメテス！！[END]
english: Atropos: That's right, I was reborn. Thanks to Mother, so that I can ELIMINATE humans better than before!! Move aside, Promethes!!

japanese: ロボ「私の名は、ロボです。[END]
english: Robo: My name is Robo.

japanese: アトロポス「プロメテス！！[END]
english: Atropos: Promethes!!

japanese: ロボ「待って……。 待ってクダサイ。
english: Robo: Wait...... PLEASE wait.

japanese: ここはワタシにまかせてクダサイ。[END]
english: PLEASE leave this to ME.

japanese: 「システムダウン……。 プログラムデリート……。[END]
english: SYSTEM DOWN...... DELETE PROGRAM......

japanese: アトロポス「プ、プロメテス……？ おひさし……、ぶりね……？[END]
english: Atropos: P, Promethes......? It's been...... a while......?

japanese: ロボ「アトロポス……？[END]
english: Robo: Atropos......?

japanese: アトロポス「あれ……？　なんで…… 壊れているの……、かしら……[END]
english: Atropos: Huh......? I wonder...... why...... am I broken......?

japanese: ロボ「アトロポス！！[END]
english: Robo: Atropos!!

japanese: アトロポス「……。 メモリーバンクが……。
english: Atropos: ...... My memory banks......

japanese: そう……たしかマザーに…… プログラムを…… 書き換えられる時……[END]
english: Yes...... must have been...... when my programming was...... rewritten by Mother......

english: Atropos: Checking memory......

japanese: ゴメンナサイ……プロメテス……[END]
english: I'm sorry...... Promethes......

japanese: ルッカ「しゃべらないで！ 今、修理……[END]
english: Lucca: Don't talk! Right now, repairs......

japanese: アトロポス「無理デス……。 もう……ほとんどの……機能が…… メモリーバンクも……[END]
english: Atropos: It's no use...... Most...... functions...... already...... Memory banks too.....

japanese: ロボ「アトロポス……！[END]
english: Robo: Atropos......!

japanese: アトロポス「コレ…… あなたの回路にも……使えるわ…… 大事……に……シテね……
english: Atropos: This...... You can use it...... in your circuits too...... Take...... good care...... of it......

japanese: サヨウ……ナラ…… プ…ロメ……テ……ス……。[END]
[System] アトロポスのリボンを使い ロボのスピードが3 まほうぼうぎょが10上がった……。[END]
english: [System] Using Atropos's ribbon, Robo's speed increased by 3 and magic defense increased by 10......

japanese: [Mother Brain] 「聞きナサイ、不完全でこわれやすく おろかな生き物よ……。
english: [Mother Brain] 'LiSTEN, foolish fragile defective living creatures......

japanese: ラヴォスの子供達は、やがて宇宙に 帰って行くデショウ。 新たなエサを、星をもとめて……。
english: Lavos's children WILL LIKELY return to space soon. Seeking new PREY, new planets......

japanese: この星は持ち直シマス。 人間さえいなければ……。
english: This planet WILL recoVER. If only humans weren't here......

japanese: そして私達ロボットの新しい世界が きずかれるのデス。 鉄の国……、にくしみも悲しみもない ユートピアが。
english: And the new world of we robots WILL be constructed. A country of iron...... a utopia with neither hatred nor sorrow.

japanese: 私達こそが人間にかわる新しい『種』 なのデス。 もうムダな事はやめナサイ。 あきらめて眠りナサイ……。[END]
english: We are the new "species" that WILL take the place of humans.  StOP your USELESS efforts already. Give up and sluMBER......

japanese: マール「何これ！？ は、早くたすけなきゃ！！[END]
english: Marle: What's this!? W, we've gotta save them, quick!!

japanese: ルッカ「な、何なのよこれ！？ たすけなきゃ！！[END]
english: Lucca: Wh, what is this!? We have to save them!!

japanese: カエル「な、何だ？　コイツは！？ たすけようぜ！[END]
english: Frog: Wh, what the? This thing!? Let's save them!

japanese: エイラ「！！ 人　いる！　助ける！！[END]
english: Ayla: !! Are people! Save!!

japanese: 魔王「ほう……。 人間処理工場というわけか？[END]
english: Magus: Oh......? Meaning this is a human processing plant?

japanese: ロボ「キカイを止めマショウ！[END]
english: Robo: LET US stop the MACHINE!

japanese: マール「キャッ！！[END]
english: Marle: Kyah!!

japanese: ルッカ「キャッ！！[END]
english: Lucca: Kyah!!

japanese: カエル「うわ！！[END]
english: Frog: Uwa!!

japanese: エイラ「！！[END]
english: Ayla: !!

japanese: [Mother Brain] 「よくココまでたどりつきマシタ……。 ワタシがRーYタイプ製造工場の メインコンピュータデス。
english: [Mother Brain] 'You HAVE done well to struggle on THIS far...... I AM the R-Y type manufacturing factory main computer.

japanese: いらっしゃいプロメテス……。 アナタの目をさまさせてあげマス。
english: Welcome, Promethes...... LET US make YOU open your eyes.

japanese: メインの回路をリセットシマショウ。 これまでの記憶を全部消し去って あげマショウ。
english: LET US reset your main circuits. LET US erase all of your memories up until now.

japanese: それから、そこの目ざわりな人間どもを かたづけマショウ。[END]
english: And then, LET US take care of those eyesore humans there.

japanese: ロボ「……。[END]
ロボ「残ねんデスガ…… ワタシはもう失うわけには いかないノデス……。
english: Robo: I regret to inform you...... There IS no way that I will part with them now......

japanese: ワタシの中の大切な記憶も かけがえのない仲間達も……。[END]
english: Either the precious memories within ME or my irreplaceable companions......

japanese: [Mother Brain] 「アナタ、ワタシまでも裏切って 人間につくと……？ すべてのロボットを敵にまわすと 言うのデスカ？[END]
english: [Mother Brain] 'You say YOU would betray even ME and side with humans......? That you WOULD make enemies of all robots?

japanese: ロボ「ワタシは人間に…… クロノや、マール、ルッカ カエルサン、エイラサン……
english: Robo: Humans...... Crono, Marle, Lucca, Frog-san, Ayla-san......

japanese: ワタシの仲間達に…… かけてみたくなったのデス。[END]
english: MY companions...... I WANT to try taking my chances with them.

japanese: [Mother Brain] 「フフ……
english: [Mother Brain] 'Hu, hu......

japanese: アハハ……[END]
アーッハッハッ……！ わらわせないでプロメテス！ アナタには、かけるものなど 何もないのデス！
english: Aaah, hah, hah......! Don't make me laugh, Promethes! YOU have no such thing as anything to take a chance with!

japanese: アナタの希望がどれほどちっぽけか 思い知らせてあげマス！[END]
english: I SHALL make you realize how minuscule YOUR hope is!

japanese: ロボ「コノ工場の……。 スベテの機能はテイシしマシタ……。 もうニ度と動きだすことは ないデショウ……。[END]
english: Robo: THIS factory...... ALL its functions HAVE been SHUT DOWN...... It will LIKELY never start up again......

japanese: マール「ロボ……。[END]
english: Marle: Robo......

japanese: ルッカ「ロボ……。[END]
english: Lucca: Robo......

japanese: カエル「ロボ……。[END]
english: Frog: Robo......

japanese: エイラ「ロボ？[END]
english: Ayla: Robo?

japanese: 魔王「フン、さっさと行くぞ。[END]
english: Magus: Hmph, let's hurry up and go.

japanese: ロボ「行きマショウ……！[END]
english: Robo: LET US go......!

japanese: [System] テラパワーアームとクライシスアームを 手に入れた！[END]
english: [System] Got the Terapower Arm and the Crisis Arm!

japanese: [System] すべての機能はテイシしている……。[END]
english: [System] All functions are shut down......

japanese: [System] あんこくせきを手に入れた！[END]
english: [System] You got the Moon Stone!

japanese: ルッカ「これは古代の太陽石？ 長い時間がたって 光を失ってしまったのね……。[END]
english: Lucca: This is the Sun Stone of the Ancient Era? It's lost its light as the long time passed......

japanese: もう1度、光をあてればエネルギーを とりもどせるかもしれないわ。 でもたぶん気の遠くなるほど 長い時間が必要ね。[END]
english: If we expose it to light once again, it might be able to regain its energy. But it's probably going to need such a long time it makes me feel faint.

japanese: ロボ「これは古代の太陽石？ 長い時間がたって 光を失っているようデス。[END]
english: Robo: This is the Sun Stone of the Ancient Era? It SEEMS that it has lost its light as the long time passed.

japanese: しかしもう一度、光をあて続ければ エネルギーをとりもどせるかも しれません。
english: However, if we continue exposing it to light once again, it may be able to regain its energy.

japanese: 私のすいそくでは6500万年 以上は必要でしょう。[END]
english: By my conjecture, it will probably require at least 65 million years.

japanese: 魔王「ほう、太陽石だな。 長い時のうちに 光を失ってしまったか。[END]
english: Magus: Oh? It's the Sun Stone. So it's lost its light during the long time.

japanese: しかしもう一度、太陽の光を あて続ければエネルギーを とりもどせるだろう。
english: But if we continue to expose it to the sun's light once more, it will probably be able to regain its energy.

japanese: 6500万年以上は必要だろうがな。[END]
english: Probably needs at least 65 million years.

japanese: マール「これって古代の 太陽石じゃない？ けど光らなくなってるよ……。[END]
english: Marle: Isn't this the Sun Stone from the Ancient Era? But it's stopped shining......

japanese: もう一度、光をあて続ければ 光をとりもどせるかも。 う～ん。　でも、きっと すっごい長い時間が必要ね。[END]
english: If we keep on exposing it to light again, it might be able to regain its light. Hmm. But, it's sure gonna need a reeaally long time.

japanese: カエル「これは古代の 太陽石ってやつか？ 全く光らなくなってるな。[END]
english: Frog: This is that Sun Stone thing from the Ancient Era? It's stopped shining entirely.

japanese: もう一度光をあて続ければ 戻るかもしれないな。 けど、太陽の力をためるって どんくらいの時間が必要なんだ。[END]
english: If we keep exposing it to light once more, it might turn back. But how much time it would need to store up the sun's power.

japanese: マール「太陽の光が……。 きっとここが一番、太陽に愛されてる 場所なんだろうね。[END]
english: Marle: The sun's light...... This has got to be the place most loved by the sun.

japanese: ルッカ「ここが夜もひるの場所……。[END]
english: Lucca: Here, even night is day......

japanese: ロボ「ココが24時間 日光が当たっている場所デスカ。[END]
english: Robo: So, HERE is a place where sunlight hits twenty four hours a day.

japanese: カエル「ここか……。 たしかに、あったけえや。[END]
english: Frog: Here......? It sure is warm.

japanese: エイラ「おお　ポカポカ！ お日様　よく当たってる！[END]
english: Ayla: Ohh, toasty! Sun hitting well!

japanese: 魔王「光のほこら…… はるか昔から、太陽の光が てり続けているという……。[END]
english: Magus: The Shrine of Light...... They say the sun's light has kept shining here since the distant past......

japanese: [System] 『あんこくせき』をおきますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Leave the “Darkness Stone”? Yes No

japanese: マール「後はシルバードで一足飛びね！[END]
english: Marle: All that's left is a jump with the Sylbird!

japanese: ルッカ「さて……と、シルバードで 行ってみましょう。[END]
english: Lucca: Okay...... well then, let's try going with the Sylbird.

japanese: ロボ「コレでシルバードで ワタシの時代に行けばオーケーデスネ。[END]
english: Robo: With THIS, everything WILL BE okay if we go to MY era with the Sylbird.

japanese: カエル「……で、いつまで ねかしときゃいいんだ！？[END]
english: Frog: ......well, how long have we got to let it sleep!?

japanese: エイラ「……。 まだ　変わらない。[END]
english: Ayla: ...... Not change yet.

japanese: 魔王「さ……、行くぞ。[END]
english: Magus: Well then...... we're going.

japanese: ルッカ「な、ない！！ 暗黒石がないわ！[END]
english: Lucca: It, it's gone!! The Darkness Stone is gone!

japanese: ホラーな話よねェ、ワクワク。[END]

english: [Woman] That husband of mine is always getting drunk off his ass at the bar! I've gotta beat some sense into him this time.

japanese: [Boss] だいくどうぐが、ぬすまれちまった…… しごとになんねーよ、これじゃ。[END]

japanese: [Maid] トマ…… ずっとこの村にいてくれればいいのに……[END]

japanese: [Maid] トマは、虹色の貝がらを探すとか言って また旅に出たみたいじゃの。[END]
english: [Maid] It looks like Toma went on a trip again, saying he'd look for the Rainbow-Colored Shell or something.

japanese: [Young Woman] 10年くらい前、この村の北にある廃墟に 魔物がなにか運び込んだらしいよ。 宝物じゃないかってウワサだけど……[END]
english: [Young Woman] I hear a monster carried something into the ruins north of this town about ten years ago. Rumor says it might be treasure......

japanese: トマ「よう、[pc1]。 俺は、ついに虹色の貝がらの 手がかりを見つけたぜ。
english: Tome: Yo, [char1]. I finally found a lead on the Rainbow-Colored Shell.

japanese: しかし、今度ばかりはヤバいかんじが するんだ。 そうそう、こいつをあんたに あずけとくぜ。[END]
english: But, just this once, I'm getting a dangerous sort of feeling. Oh yeah, I'll leave this with you.

japanese: トマ「もし俺が死んだら、俺の墓に この酒をかけてくれよ。
english: Toma: If I die, pour this sake on my grave.

japanese: ……、ケッ、エンギでもねェや。[END]
english: ......keh, it's like I'm jinxing myself.

japanese: [Maid] ああ…… トマは今ごろ、どこを旅してるのかしら……[END]
english: [Maid] Ahh...... I wonder where Toma's traveling now......?

japanese: [Boss] へ？　大工道具をかせ？ 別にかまわんが、どーする気だ？

japanese: ……、ま、いーや。 俺はもーちょい飮んで行くから 道具はかみさんから受け取ってくれや。[END]

english: [Woman] Use them with care.

japanese: がっくし……[END]

japanese: [Boss] さっきはあんがとよ。 これでおいらも、しごとが出来るぜ！

japanese: 野郎ども、行くぜ！

english: [Young Men] Gotcha! Boss!

english: [Boss] We fixed it.

english: [Boss] Fixing the Northern Ruins? It'll take 2,000G. Pay Don't pay

japanese: 金がねーんじゃ、無理だぜ。[END]
english: If you ain't got the money, it ain't happening.

親友のお前の事を……[END]

japanese: さァて、次にねらうは伝説の太陽石だ！[END]

english: [Young Woman] There's been a lot of soldiers moving in and out of Guardia Castle lately...... Well, if you say it's because it's the castle, I guess you're right.

japanese: [Young Man] 城の兵士に聞いたんだが 最近、大臣の様子がなんか変だとか……。[END]

japanese: [Young Man] そういえば……、楽しみにしてる ガルディア王のパレード いつまでたってもはじまらない……。 どうしたんだろう？[END]
english: [Young Man] Come to think of it...... King Guardia's parade that I'm looking forward to isn't starting however much time passes...... I wonder what's wrong?

japanese: [System] 不思議な力で封印されている……。[END]
english: [System] It's sealed with a mysterious power......

japanese: ペンダントに反応して中の物が光りだした。 なかみを取り出しますか？ はい いいえ[END]

japanese: [Soldier] 間もなく裁判が始まります。 誰って？

japanese: ガルディア王の裁判です。[END]

english: [Soldier] Don't say anything unnecessary!

japanese: [Young Woman] 見はってなくたって大臣の料理に 毒なんかもりませんよ。[END]
english: [Young Woman] I wouldn't put poison or anything in the Chancellor's food even if you weren't keeping watch.

japanese: [Soldier] 裁判が終わるまでは ふうさしろとの大臣のご命令です。[END]
english: [Soldier] Until the trial ends, the Chancellor's orders are to close this off.

english: [Soldier] Same as the left.

japanese: そこに、かいだんなんか あったっけな……？[END]

english: Chancellor: Everyone! Do you know of the "Rainbow-Colored Shell" heirloom passed down in the royal family? Until I saw this, I did not know of it either.

japanese: 大臣「ガルディアの遠い祖先の書いた 遺言です。
english: Chancellor: It's a will that Guardia's distant ancestor wrote.

japanese: 『千年の建国祭の時に 家宝『虹色の貝がら』を 国民の前にまつれ。』[END]
english: "At the time of the National Foundation Millennial Festival, present the heirloom, "Rainbow-Colored Shell" before the people."

japanese: 王「そんな物は知らん！ だいたい家宝などこの城にはない。[END]
english: King: I know of no such thing! There's no such thing as an heirloom in this castle to begin with.

japanese: 大臣「これがニセモノとでも？
english: Chancellor: Are you suggesting this is a forgery?

japanese: なぜヒコクは『虹色の貝がら』を 国民の前に出さないのか？
english: Why does the defendant not bring out the "Rainbow-Colored Shell" before the people?

japanese: それはもうここにないからです。 よくに目がくらんだヒコクはお金ほしさ に大事な家宝を売ってしまったのです。 さ、証人を……。[END]
english: That is because it is no longer here. The defendant, dazzled by greed, sold the precious heirloom out of a want for money. Now, the witnesses......

japanese: マール「父上！[END]

english: Chancellor: You're disreputable. If only you had proof, you could verify the king's innocence.

japanese: マール「しょうこ？

japanese: 大臣「ええ もし家宝を売っていなければ まだこの城にあるはずですからな。
english: Chancellor: Yes, because supposing that he hasn't sold the heirloom, it should still be in this castle.

japanese: 私の目の前に『虹色の貝がら』を 持って来られたのならば、無罪を みとめましょう。 ま、無理でしょうけどね……くく…。[END]
english: If you go bring the "Rainbow-Colored Shell" before my eyes, I shall admit the king's innocence. Well, I doubt that's possible, though...... ku, ku...

japanese: 王「大臣！　何をたくらんでおる？！[END]
english: King: Chancellor! What are you plotting?!

japanese: 大臣「さ、そいつらをつまみ出せ！[END]
english: Chancellor: Now, throw them out!

japanese: だめです。 王女さまといえどもお通しできません。[END]

english: Marle: What are you saying! That's the chancellor's made-up story. There's no such thing as an heirloom in the first place!!

japanese: マール「なるほど！
english: Marle: I get it!
