english: Marle: Let's go. It's got to be in the basement!

japanese: ルッカ「『虹色の貝がら』を 持って行けば無実を証明出来るわ！[END]
english: Lucca: If we bring the "Rainbow-Colored Shell", we can prove his innocence!

japanese: ルッカ「わすれたの？ 私達がAD600年でやってきた事…。 歴史を変えたため、今の時代のこの城に 『虹色の貝がら』はあるはずなのよ！[END]
english: Lucca: Have you forgotten? What we did in A.D.600... Because we changed history, the "Rainbow-Colored Shell" should be in this castle in the current era!

japanese: ロボ「『虹色の貝がら』を 持っていけば無実を証明デキマス。[END]
english: Robo: If we bring the "Rainbow-Colored Shell", we CAN prove his innocence.

japanese: ロボ「わすれマシタカ？ AD600年でやってきた事。 歴史を変えたため、今の時代のこの城に 『虹色の貝がら』があるはずなのデス。[END]
english: Robo: HAVE you forgotten? What we did in A.D.600. Because we changed history, the "Rainbow-Colored Shell" should BE in this castle in the current era.

japanese: カエル「『虹色の貝がら』を 持って行けば無実を証明できるぜ。[END]
english: Frog: If we bring the "Rainbow-Colored Shell", we can prove his innocence!

japanese: カエル「わすれたか？ 俺達がAD600年でやってきた事を。 歴史を変えたため、今の時代のこの城に 『虹色の貝がら』があるはずなんだ。[END]
english: Frog: Have you forgotten? What we did in A.D.600. Because we changed history, the "Rainbow-Colored Shell" should be in this castle in the current era.

japanese: エイラ「『虹色の貝がら』　持ってく！ マールの父親　助かる！！[END]
english: Ayla: Bring "Rainbow-Colored Shell"! Help Marle's father!!

japanese: エイラ「思いだせ　マール！ エイラ達　むかしの王様 たのんだ！ 『虹色の貝がら』　今　この城ある！ ちがうか？[END]
english: Ayla: Remember, Marle! Aylas asked old times king! "Rainbow-Colored Shell" now in this castle! That wrong?

japanese: 魔王「『虹色の貝がら』を 持って行けばいいではないか……。[END]
english: Magus: Shouldn't we just bring the "Rainbow-Colored Shell"......?

japanese: 魔王「バカめ、わすれたか？ AD600年でやってきた事を……。[END]
english: Magus: You idiot, you forgot? What we did in A.D.600......

japanese: [Soldier] まもなく判決が出ます。 それまで誰も出入りを許すなとの 大臣のご命令で。[END]
english: [Soldier] A verdict will be reached before long. The Chancellor's orders are to allow no one in or out until then.

japanese: [Soldier] ここは宝物庫です。 危険ですので入れません。[END]
english: [Soldier] This is the treasure vault. It is dangerous, so you cannot enter.

japanese: [Soldier] く…… ネズミにスネをかじられた。[END]
english: [Soldier] Kh...... My leg got bitten by a rat.

japanese: にょろた「親分は13代にわたる うらみがはらせるってウキウキさ。 きっきっきっき！
english: Slitherta: It's so great the boss'll be able to avenge his 13-generation grudge. Kee, kee, kee, kee, kee!

japanese: にょろぽん「でっちあげのしょうこ品で 王様を死刑にするんだとよ。 きっきっきっき！[END]
english: Slitherpon: He says the king'll be condemned to death with the made-up evidence. Kee, kee, kee, kee!

japanese: マール「やっぱりいんぼうよ！ 急ぎましょう！[END]
english: Marle: There really is a conspiracy! Let's hurry!

japanese: 商人「ええ、たしかに王様から 買いましたよ。 大変お金に困られていた様子で……。
english: Merchant: Yes, I definitely bought it from the King. He seemed to be having serious money troubles, and......

japanese: ガルディア王「うそをもうすな！ 私はお前など会ったこともない。[END]
english: King Guardia: Don't lie! I've never even met you.

japanese: 裁判長「せいしゅくに！[END]
english: Presiding Judge: Silence!

japanese: 商人「へへ これでよかったかい？
english: Merchant: Heh heh, Was that good?

japanese: 大臣「グーだ！[END]
english: Chancellor: Good!

japanese: マール「あった！　虹色の貝がら！！[END]
english: Marle: Here it is! The Rainbow-Colored Shell!!

japanese: ルッカ「何これ……、てがみ？[END]
english: Lucca: What's this...... a letter?

japanese: ロボ「何デスカ、このてがみハ？[END]
english: Robo: What IS it, this letter?

japanese: カエル「こんな所にてがみ……？[END]
english: Frog: A letter in a place like this......?

japanese: エイラ「ここ　何かある！ かみ　ある　かみ　ある！[END]
english: Ayla: Something here! Paper here, paper here!

japanese: 魔王「てがみがあるぞ。 もやすか？[END]
english: Magus: There's a letter. Burn it?

japanese: マール「マールへ……？
english: Marle: To Marle......?

japanese: 親愛なるマールへ。 父上との仲はいかがでしょう？
english: Dear Marle. How are your relations with your father?

japanese: 今のあなたには、わからないかも 知れませんが、いがみあっても はなれていても、親子は親子。
english: As you are now, you may not understand, but even when you quarrel, even when you are apart, parent and child are parent and child.

japanese: あなたは、いつか親から巣立って 行かねばなりません。 そして、あなたもいつか親となる。
english: You must someday leave your parent's nest. And then, you too will someday become a parent.

japanese: それはいつの世も変わりないはず。 だからこそ、私達とマールも つながっているのですから……。
english: I doubt that will change in any generation. That exactly is why we and you are also linked......

japanese: ガルディア王21世 その妃リーネより。[END]
english: From King Guardia the 21st's Queen Leene.

japanese: ルッカ「ニクい事やってくれるわね……
english: Lucca: What a horribly wonderful thing to do......

japanese: って、それどころじゃないわ！[END]
english: Hey, this is no time for that!

japanese: ロボ「ワタシは親がいないので 子を愛する気持ちがわかりまセンが この文章は何か……あたたかいデスネ。[END]
english: Robo: I have no parents, so I do NOT understand the feeling of loving a child, but this text IS somehow...... warm.

japanese: カエル「リーネ様……
english: Frog: Leene-sama......

japanese: さ、先を急ごう！[END]
english: Come on, let's hurry on!

japanese: エイラ「おう　すだつ！ エイラにもそれ　わかる！ プテランもすだつ。 時たてば　すだつ！
english: Ayla: Oh, leave nest! Ayla understand that too! Pteran leave nest too. When time pass, leave nest!

japanese: マールも　すだつか？ それすごい！[END]
english: Marle leave nest too? That great!

japanese: エイラ「すだつ！　ねねする！ 子供うむ！　おっぱいやる！ そしてまた　子がすだつ！[END]
english: Ayla: Leave nest! Sleep! Bear kids! Give boobs! And then kids leave nest again!

japanese: エイラ「オマエ　だいじょぶか？ おっぱいないな……。[END]
english: Ayla: You be okay? Not have boobs......

japanese: 魔王「感動している場合では ないと思うが……。[END]
english: Magus: I don't think this is any time to be getting all emotional......

japanese: マール「父上！今行くからねッ！！[END]
english: Marle: Father! I'll be right there!!

japanese: 裁判長「ばいしんいん達よ。 有罪と思う者は左へ 無罪だと思う者は右へ行きなさい！[END]
english: Presiding Judge: Jurors. Go, those who think he is guilty to the left, those who think he is not guilty to the right!

japanese: [Juror] 有罪[END]
english: [Juror] Guilty.

japanese: マール「どーしてもダメと言うの？
english: Marle: You mean it's no good no matter what?

japanese: 兵士「はい、どーしてもです。[END]
english: Soldier: Yes, no matter what.

japanese: マール「手はあるわ！ 少々あらっぽいけど……
english: Marle: There's a way! It's a bit rough, but......

japanese: ついて来て！[END]
english: Follow me!

japanese: 裁判長「判決をいいわたす！ 有罪4　無罪1 よって有罪とする！！[END]
english: Presiding Judge: I shall announce the verdict! Guilty: 4, innocent: 1 Accordingly, we find him guilty!!

japanese: 大臣「これでガルディアの時代は 終わりましたな…… これからは、この私が国をしきします。
english: Chancellor: With this, the age of Guardia has ended...... From now on, I will run the country.

japanese: さ！　つれて行け！！[END]
english: Now! Take him away!!

japanese: [Marle] 「待ってーーー！！[END]
english: [Marle] 'Waaaaaaiiit!!

japanese: 大臣「誰だ！[END]
english: Chancellor: Who is it!

japanese: マール「ちちうえェーー！！[END]
english: Marle: Fatherrrrr!!

japanese: 王「マールディア！[END]
english: King: Marledia!

japanese: 大臣「マールディア様！[END]
english: Chancellor: Marledia-sama!

japanese: 大臣「し、しかしもうおそい！ ガルディア王は国民の裁判によって刑は 決まったのです。　王と言えども……[END]
english: Chancellor: H, however, it's too late! King Guardia's sentence was decided though a trial of the people. Even though he may be king......

japanese: マール「そんな事ないわ！ それは、あなたのでっちあげよ！！[END]
english: Marle: Not a chance! You framed him!!

japanese: 大臣「いやいや、事実王は王家の宝を……
english: Chancellor: No, no, the truth about the king is, the royal family's treasure......

japanese: マール「宝ならここに！！[END]
english: Marle: If it's the treasure, here!!

japanese: 大臣「そ、それは！[END]
english: Chancellor: Th, that's!

japanese: マール「かんねんなさい！ 大臣！[END]
english: Marle: Give it up, chancellor!

japanese: 大臣「くく……[END]
english: Chancellor: Ku, ku......

japanese: マール「？[END]
english: Marle: ?

japanese: 大臣「くくくく……
english: Chancellor: Ku, ku, ku, ku......

japanese: かんねんするのは君達の方だよ。 先祖代々うけつがれてきたうらみ 今ここではらさせてもらうよ！[END]
english: The ones who should give it up are you. I'll make you pay back the grudge inherited for generations from my ancestors, here and now!

japanese: 大臣「スーパーウルトラデラックス 大臣チェーーーンジ！！[END]
english: Chancellor: Super Ultra Deluxe Chancellor Chaaaange!!

japanese: マール「父上…… 私……[END]
english: Marle: Father...... I......

japanese: 王「いいんじゃ、何も言うな。 わからずやの私がいけなかったんだ。[END]
english: King: It's fine, don't say anything. I shouldn't have been so obstinate.

japanese: マール「私こそ父上の気持ちも 知らないで……
english: Marle: It's me, who not even knowing your feelings......

japanese: ううん…… 頭ではわかっていたけど うまく言葉にならなくて……。[END]
english: No...... I understood in my head, but couldn't put it into words well......

japanese: 王「私もさ。 一時はお前が本当に遠くに行って しまったように思えた。
english: King: I too. For a time, it seemed as though you were truly going far away.

japanese: でもよく考えてみると、遠くに行って いたのは私のほうだったのだな。[END]
english: But when I tried thinking it over well, the one who had gone far was I.

japanese: マール「今は近くにいる。 これからは父上に何でも言える。
english: Marle: Now we're close. From now on, I can tell you anything.

japanese: いろんな事をそうだんしたり クロノの事を話したり 母上の事を聞いたり……[END]
english: Seek advice on various things, talk about Crono, ask about mother......

japanese: 王「母か……はずかしい話だが あの時の言葉が今やっと わかってきた気がする。
english: King: Your mother...... it's embarrassing to talk about, but I feel like I've finally come to understand her words of that day.

japanese: アリーチェがいきを引き取る前に 言った言葉……
english: The words Ariche said before she breathed her last......

japanese: 『マールディアが大きくなれば あなたの前に好きな人を連れて来る日が 来るでしょう。
english: "When Marledia grows up, the day will likely come when she brings the person she loves before you.

japanese: その時は2人をあたたかく むかえてやってね。
english: At that time, welcome the two of them warmly.

japanese: ……だって、その日はあなたにとっても わすれられないすばらしい日に なるのですから。』[END]
english: ......after all, it will be a wonderful, unforgettable day for you, too."

japanese: マール「母上の最後の言葉を 父上は聞いていたのね？
english: Marle: So you were listening to mother's last words?

japanese: 王「ああ…… お前は小さかったからおぼえて いないかもしれないが……
english: King: Yes...... You were little so you may not remember, but......

japanese: 『パパ、私好きな人いっぱいいるよ！ いっぱい　いっぱい！』 ってはしゃいでいたよ。 そんなマールディアを見て安心した アリーチェはほほえみながらいきを 引き取った……。[END]
english: You were being cheerful, saying "Papa, there are lots of people I like! Lots, lots!" Seeing you like that, Ariche was at peace and smiled as she breathed her last......

japanese: マール「そうだったの……
english: Marle: So that's how it was......

japanese: ガルディア王「どうしたんだい？[END]
english: King Guardia: What's wrong?

japanese: マール「私って小さいころは 父上のことパパって呼んでいたのね。
english: Marle: When I was little, I called you papa.

japanese: 王「ああ、そうだよ。[END]
english: King: Yes, that's right.

japanese: マール「ごめんなさい…… パパ…… わがまま言って本当にごめんなさい…。[END]
english: Marle: I'm sorry...... Papa...... I'm really sorry for saying selfish things...

japanese: 王「城を出るのはみとめよう、じゃが！
english: King: I will approve of you leaving the castle, but!

japanese: くれぐれも気をつけるのじゃぞ。 キミ達、娘をたのんだぞ。[END]
english: I insist that you be careful. You others, take care of my daughter.

japanese: ルッカ「……はい！[END]
english: Lucca: ......okay!

japanese: ロボ「オマカセクダサイ！[END]
english: Robo: PLEASE LEAVE IT TO US!

japanese: カエル「……しょうちいたしました。[END]
english: Frog: ......understood.

japanese: エイラ「お前　心配しょう！ エイラ　マール　守る！[END]
english: Ayla: You worry too much! Ayla protect Marle!

japanese: [Bosch] 「さて、ワシの出番じゃな……。[END]
english: [Bosch] 'Well then, it's my turn......

japanese: マール「ボッシュ！[END]
english: Marle: Bosch!

japanese: ルッカ「ボッシュ！[END]
english: Lucca: Bosch!

japanese: ロボ「ボッシュサン！[END]
english: Robo: Bosch-SAN!

japanese: カエル「じーさん！[END]
english: Frog: Old man!

japanese: エイラ「ボッシュ！[END]
english: Ayla: Bosch!

japanese: ボッシュ「お前さん達ばかりに おいしい所を持ってかれてたまるか。 虹色の貝がらからの防具作りは ワシがやろう！
english: Bosch: As if I'd let you guys take all the tasty parts. I'll take care of making armor from the Rainbow-Colored Shell!

japanese: ひさかたぶりの出番じゃ。 腕がなるわい！[END]
english: My first turn in quite a long time. I'm itching for action!

japanese: ボッシュ「これは特別な物質じゃ。 これから作る防具は魔法攻撃を受けた 時のききめを弱める事が出来るのじゃ。
english: Bosch: This is a special material. Armoring made from this will be able to weaken the effect when you suffer magical attacks.

japanese: プリズム・ドレスはききめが大きいが 1つしか出来ん。 ききめの小さいプリズム・メットは3つ 出来るな。
english: A Prism Dress will have a great effect, but I can't make more than one. I can make three Prism Helms that have a small effect.

japanese: どっちにするね？ プリズム・ドレス一つ プリズム・メット三つ[END]
english: Which will it be? 1 Prism Dress 3 Prism Helms

japanese: ボッシュ「プリズム・ドレスじゃな？ こいつは女の子しか装備出来んぞ？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Bosch: The Prism Dress? No one but the girls can equip that one. Yes. No.

japanese: ボッシュ「プリズム・メットじゃな？ こいつは誰でも装備可能じゃが？ はい いいえ[END]
english: Bosch: The Prism Helms? Anyone can equip those. Yes. No.

japanese: ボッシュ「よーし、待っておれ！ 腕によりをかけて、このボッシュ 一世一代の代物をこしらえてやるぞ！[END]
english: Bosch: Okay, just you wait! Applying my skill to its utmost, I, Bosch, will manufacture once-in-a-lifetime goods!

japanese: ボッシュ「完成じゃ。 これを持っていけ！[END]
english: Bosch: It's done. Take this with you!

japanese: ボッシュ「これで役に立てたわい。[END]
english: Bosch: I have now been of use.

japanese: ボッシュ「この物質…… もうひとつ別の何かとかけ合わせれば とんでもない物が出きるぞい！[END]
english: Bosch: This material...... If I could cross it with another special something, I could make something incredible!

japanese: ボッシュ「おお！太陽石か。 さっそくこいつとかけ合わせてみよう！[END]
english: Bosch: Oh! The Sun Stone? I'll try crossing it with this one right away!

japanese: ボッシュ「ふふ。 これで終わったと思うな。 今回のボッシュはおおはりきりじゃ！[END]
english: Bosch: Hu, hu. Don't think I'm finished with this. Bosch is really enthusiastic this time!

japanese: [Soldier] まさか大臣がモンスターだったとは……[END]
english: [Soldier] How could the chancellor have been a monster......?

japanese: [Soldier] 王もやっと、お元気になられた。[END]
english: [Soldier] The King has finally recovered his health too.

japanese: [Soldier] 大臣が魔物だったのを見ぬけんとは……[END]
english: [Soldier] To think we couldn't see through the chancellor being a monster......

japanese: [Soldier] これで城も千年祭らしくなったな。[END]
english: [Soldier] Now the castle feels like a Millennial Festival too.

japanese: [Soldier] ニセの大臣がひきいていた兵達は みな魔物だったらしい。[END]
english: [Soldier] I hear that all the soldiers the fake chancellor led were monsters.

japanese: [Pierre] ベンゴシのピエールです。
english: [Pierre] I'm the lawyer Pierre.

japanese: だとすると、本物の大臣はどこに？[END]
english: So, where's the real chancellor?

japanese: 大臣「ふーっ、助かったわい！ あの化け物め、こんなとこに おしこめおってからに……！[END]
english: Chancellor: Phew, I'm saved! That damn monster, leaving me shut up in a place like this......!

japanese: 大臣「お、マールディア様！ お友達ですかな？[END]
english: Chancellor: Oh, Marledia-sama! These are your friends?

japanese: 大臣「と、こうしちゃおれん。 千年祭ムーンライト・パレードの じゅんびにとりかからねば！[END]
english: Chancellor: Ah, I can't be doing this. I have to set about preparing for the Millenial Festival Moonlight Parade!

japanese: [Chancellor] マールディア様！ こよいのムーンライト・パレードで このじいより、すてきなプレゼントを いたしますぞ！[END]
english: [Chancellor] Marledia-sama! You shall receive a wonderful present at tonight's Moonlight Parade from this old man!

japanese: [Pierre] ベンゴシのピエールです。
english: [Pierre] I'm the lawyer Pierre.

japanese: かねてから千年祭のパレードを 大臣と計画していたのです。[END]
english: I have been planning the Millennial Festival's parade with the chancellor for some time.

japanese: [Chancellor] こよいのムーンライト・パレード キミ達も楽しみにしていなされ！[END]
english: [Chancellor] You all look forward to tonight's Moonlight Parade too!

japanese: [Soldier] これでムーンライト・パレードを 予定通りおこなえる。[END]
english: [Soldier] Now the Moonlight Parade can be carried out as planned.

japanese: [Soldier] きっと、すばらしい夜になるぞ。[END]
english: [Soldier] It's sure to be a magnificent night.

japanese: [Soldier] パレードは千年祭のグランドフィナーレだ。[END]
english: [Soldier] The parade is the Millennial Festival's grand finale.

japanese: [Soldier] 誰もが子供のころにもどれる。 そんなパレードだ。[END]
english: [Soldier] Everyone will be able to go back to when they were children. It's that kind of a parade.

japanese: [Maid] よかった、本当に……。[END]
english: [Maid] Honestly, thank goodness......

japanese: [King] すまなかったな、キミ達。 いや、思いかえせば、はずかしい所を 見せてしまった……。
english: [King] I'm sorry, all of you. No, now that I look back on it, I let you see something embarrassing......

japanese: これからもマールディアを よろしくたのむぞ。[END]
english: Take good care of Marledia from now on too.

japanese: やはり本物の大臣は無事じゃったな。 兵士の部屋でパレードのうちあわせをすると すっとんで行きおったぞ！[END]
english: The real Chancellor was okay after all. He rushed off saying he was having a parade meeting in the soldiers' room.

japanese: [Man] さ、姫様！　まずは体育から！[END]
english: [Man] Come on, Princess! Start with athletics first!

japanese: [Old Man] いやいや、教育じゃ！[END]
english: [Old Man] No, no, education!

japanese: [Nun] いいえ、やはりしつけをやり直さないと！[END]
english: [Nun] No, we really must start discipline all over again!

japanese: [Waiter] お食事なら、こちらにおかけ下さい。[END]
english: [Waiter] If you are eating, please be seated here.

japanese: [Waiter] 何にいたします？ リフレッシュパン スタミナうなじゅう クロ・スペシャル[END]

english: [Young Man] Hey, it's thanks to you guys! Please, eat.

japanese: [Queen Zeal] 見よ！ ラヴォス神が世界の王となられたこの星を！[END]
english: [Queen Zeal] Behold! This planet where Lavos-god is king of the world!

japanese: [Queen Zeal] おぬし達虫ケラどもが いくらあがこうとも、もうおそい。 すでにこの星は、ラヴォス神によって 食いつくされておるわ！[END]

japanese: [System] かたく閉ざされている……。[END]
english: [System] It's tightly closed......

japanese: [System] シルバードにもどりますか？ はい いいえ[END]
english: [System] Return to the Sylbird? Yes No

japanese: [Queen Zeal] 虫ケラどもが！ またも、わらわにさからうつもりか！[END]
english: [Queen Zeal] Worms! Do you intend to oppose me once again?!

japanese: わらわは永遠の命を手に入れた！ ラヴォス神とともに永遠に生き続けるのだ！ ラヴォス神は地中でゆっくりと星を食らう。[END]
english: I have obtained eternal life! I will keep to living forever along with Lavos-god! Lavos-god is underground, leisurely consuming the planet.

japanese: そして力をたくわえ14000年のちに 星をほろぼし、世界の王となられるのじゃ！[END]
english: And it will store up power, destroy the planet in 14,000 years, and become king of the world!

japanese: [Queen Zeal] そして力をたくわえ1400年のちに 星をほろぼし、世界の王となられるのじゃ！[END]
english: [Queen Zeal] And it will store up power, destroy the planet in 1400 years, and become king of the world!

japanese: [Queen Zeal] そして力をたくわえ999年のちに 星をほろぼし、世界の王となられるのじゃ！[END]
english: [Queen Zeal] And it will store up power, destroy the planet in 999 years, and become king of the world!

japanese: [Queen Zeal] この黒の夢は、ラヴォス神へとつながる道。 わらわに無限の力をあたえてくれる神殿。
english: [Queen Zeal] This Black Dream is a road connecting to Lavos-god. A temple that provides me with infinite power.

japanese: おぬし達のもとめる未来なぞ この奥におわすラヴォス神があられる限り 望むべくもないわ！[END]
english: You should not even wish for such a thing as the future you seek as long as Lavos-god within here exists!

japanese: おぬし達は、ラヴォス神への 生けにえとなるがよい！ フォフォフォ！！[END]
english: May you become a sacrifice to the god Lavos! Foh, foh, foh!!

english: [Nu] Oyo! In a place like this, and three besides! The way ahead is still long , so please take your time here.

japanese: この夢からさめたいのなら なんとかしますけど……。[END]
english: Though if you want to wake from this dream, we'll manage it somehow......

japanese: まいどありっ！[END]

english: Boss: Well then, let me hear what your dream is, gribbit.

japanese: おやぶん「ゲロッ　ゲロッ　ゲロッ！[END]

japanese: 永遠の黒き夢に……！[END]
